more description: Please check us out on Instagram! @houstonfurnished  .Welcome to this modern freestanding home, complete with a private heated pool and hot tub, steps away from The Washington Avenue entertainment district!  Walk to dozens of  renowned culinary hot spots, pubs, markets, and Houston's Memorial Park!The spaceThis home is located one block south of popular Washington Avenue and less than a mile east of Memorial Park. We have 3 spacious bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, including double sink and walk in closet in the master. The home has a large kitchen, dining room, & living room. We have 75 inch tv in the living room, 65 inch tv in the Master bedroom, and an 60 inch tv in the second bedroom. We also have a desk in the common area for quick laptop setup.

more description: This King Suite Bedroom and 1 Bath Apartment is located in theTexas Medical Center, right across from the NRG Stadium. It is just 15 minutes away from The Galleria and Downtown. Enjoy everything Houston has to offer from parks, museums, shopping malls, coffee shops, and the best restaurants in the city all within 8 minutes. The unit has 5-star amenities including: -Free Parking-Keurig Coffee Maker-High-Speed Wifi-Smart TVs-Gym  -Pool  -Blender  -Toaster  -Washer and DryerThe spaceThis space is perfectly suited for any guests coming for the following reasons:- Medical Patients - You are just 1 mile away from the Med Center!- Medical Staff/ Nurses/Students - Right inside the Medical Hub.- Business professionals- If you’re coming to Houston for business, this place is right in the middle of Houston. - Visitors-The  museum district is literally only 5 minutes away , as well as the best parks and malls!If this is you, look no where else ;)We provide you with a fully furnished King Suite that includes high-speed internet, coffee station, Smart TVs, streaming services, washer and dryers, and several other things!King Suite:Our space is staged to feel like you are right at home. The King bedroom offers a King Pillow Top Mattress with a cozy comforter and both soft and firm pillows. Enjoy the 40 inch 4K UHD Smart TV for you to Netflix and Chill. Kitchen:Our kitchen offers full amenities like a top-grade Keurig, Blender, Toaster, Fridge, Microwave, Cookware, Knife Set, Glassware, and Dinnerware! We provide you with extra amenities like k-cups, tea, creamer, and other kitchen essentials!Living Room:Our Cozy Living Room is beautifully decorated with a 65 in 4K UHD Smart TV, with a comfortable sofa and loveseat for you to kick back and relax.

more description: A balance of sophisticated and comfortable, luxurious and laid back, this is a place where expectations aren’t just met, they’re exceeded. Needs aren’t simply addressed, they’re personally attended to. Our residents don’t just live here, they belong.The spaceExplore this one bedroom downtown Houston apartment to find open-concept floor plans. Steps away from your front door, you’ll have exclusive access to community amenities designed to bring your vision of luxury living to life, high above the city lights of downtown Houston.This is everything Houston high rise apartment living should be. And, through our unmatched lifestyle upgrades, it’s your own personal awakening to the reality of what home truly can be.You’ll never have nothing to do.Our goal is to go above and beyond to make your life more enjoyable, so we’ve developed an impressive list of unmatched amenities to complement our luxury high-rise apartments in Houston, and bring ease back into your lifestyle. Start your morning with a virtual class in our sky studio and gym featuring state-of-the-art equipment. Then, catch up with friends over drinks on the rooftop lounge with bar service. For a truly decadent experience, cap off your day in our spa, which comes complete with sauna, steam, and massage rooms. Designed to cater to a variety of interests and lifestyles, we proudly offer you more of everything. Because we believe that’s exactly what you deserve.Committed to your needs and focused on your convenience, we bring a passionate professionalism to serving you.Vehicle ValetConciergePackage Delivery DeskValet Dry CleaningPet Walking, Sitting and GroomingRelaxation and EntertainmentConveniently located in downtown Houston’s entertainment district, you’ll still have plenty to do without ever leaving the building.Infinity Deck with a Glass Bottom Pool Suspended Out Over the Streets of Downtown HoustonOutdoor Lounge Areas with Grilling Spaces and Fire PitPalm Terrace Heated Pool and Spa with CabanasVeranda Grilling Space with Outdoor Kitchen and Fire PitGame Room with Air Hockey, Skee-Ball, Ping-Pong and Arcade GamesBilliards RoomPoker SuiteIndoor Basketball CourtVirtual Golf SimulatorMovie TheatreChildren’s PlayroomGrand Ballroom with Catering KitchenDemonstration KitchenTemperature-controlled Wine Room with Private LockersSpa Relaxation Room with Men’s and Women’s Locker RoomsSteam, Sauna and Massage RoomsSunless Tanning SuiteSky Lounge with Bar ServicesFitness and Professional SpacesMarket Square Tower’s spaces offer the opportunity for self-improvement, whether it be physically or professionally.Sky Gym with State-Of-The-Art Fitness EquipmentSky Studio with Virtual Class OfferingsSky Room for Private Dining or Business MeetingsCyber LoungeExecutive Conference RoomOther AmenitiesAdditional amenities are designed to increase convenience and accommodate your personal needs.CVS Pharmacy and GroceryUpgraded Connectivity to Guarantee Cell Phone Reception Throughout PropertyBicycle Storage with Repair StationFully-Equipped Pet Grooming RoomResident Storage Units

more description: ✓  Comfy King Bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Montrose Apartment (700 sq ft) ✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓  Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓  5* SUPER host with 8000+ reviews✓  55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓  500MBPS fiber secured WiFi✓  Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓  Secured Reserved Parking Spot✓   5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.￫ Central A/C & Heat ￫ Keurig with Coffee/Cream/Sugar & Tea (variety)￫ Extra parkings right in front of the buildingIt is important to us that your experience be second to none while staying as our guest. We take pride in the cleanliness of our property and the extra thought we put into your home away from home stay.• 2.3 miles : Toyota Center (Rockets) / George R Brown Convention Center/Discovery Green• 1.8 miles : World class Medical District, Houston zooHouston – Lower Montrose/Heights area modern theme Getaway with entire 650 square feet recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 2 single beds  and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.Located in the trendy Lower Montrose/River Oaks/Heights area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new Kroger Foods, HEB, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog (3 mins walk), Present Company (Bar 3 mins walk), Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) – • El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!) • Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• Flagship Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• 2 Starbuck's • Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks TheaterUnder 8 minute Uber will you to – • Central Downtown • Museum District • U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer. We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.→ Montrose was named one of the "ten great neighborhoods in America" for its demographic diversity, renovated mansions, bungalows with wide porches, and cottages located along tree-lined boulevards.

The bathrooms include Trader Joe's shampoo and conditioner, hand soap as well as a hair dryer and fluffy towels.

description: Storehouse Studio Downtown First Ward Art District
name: Guest suite in Washington Avenue - Memorial Park
unit rental details: Entire guest suite hosted by Amber2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A charming studio apartment located in the heart of Houston's eclectic First Ward Arts District. Clean, comfortable, and freshly remodeled. Centrally located just north of downtown near major sports stadiums, restaurants, and museums. Travel to Houston's world renowned museum district, the Heights, the Texas Medical Center and the Galleria all less than 8 miles away. We provide complimentary coffee, tea, laundry soap, shampoo and conditioner!The spaceThe original home was built over 140 years ago in the 1880's  to house railroad workers. After our family immigrated from Sicily in 1942, they built a convenience store on the front of the house in the 1950s. They ran this store for 30 years and we are the 4th generation to live in the home. We remodeled this space from the studs and converted the old store into a studio apartment, which is why we affectionately call it the "Storehouse Studio". Every construction detail was specifically crafted with hosting guests in mind. The space is completely private and located in front of the main house, with only one external wall attached to the main roof. This 315 square foot studio is fully separate with a private entrance, a reserved off street parking space including all the amenities of home and is located on the ground floor. It includes a bathroom with garden soaking tub, washer and dryer, a kitchen complete with all necessary amenities including a gas stove, pots/pans/silverware, microwave, olive oil & spices, refrigerator with ice maker, a table for meals, a built in desk with a reading light and a main open bedroom area with a queen-size bed. An internet connected smart TV is already hooked up to our Disney+, Netflix, Hulu, ESPN and Amazon movie accounts. Or if you prefer, you can log into your personal accounts to stream videos. The A/C and heater are adjustable using a remote near the bed. Also, we have a dedicated WiFi hotspot for the studio and the password is sent to you once you book!

Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer.We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. We have a pack and play, and kids toys available upon request. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.￫ Montrose was named one of the "ten great neighborhoods in America" for its demographic diversity, renovated mansions, bungalows with wide porches, and cottages located along tree-lined boulevards.

name: Apartment in Downtown Houston

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description:
Your Houston getaway begins at The Hogg Palace. Formerly an auto showroom, its industrial past is highlighted through original hardwood flooring and magnificent factory windows. Each unique space features in-suite laundry and fully equipped kitchens. If it’s too hot outside for a run, the 24-hour gym provides a great workout. Step outside and you’re in the heart of the Theater District. Home to the Houston Symphony Orchestra, Jones Hall will leave you speechless with its incredible concerts and performances. You can walk the trails along Sesquicentennial Park. Or sip a pint of Saint Arnold Hideaway at Flying Saucer Draught Emporium. The Hogg Palace is the first stop in your Downtown adventures.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in
 - 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials 
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- In-suite laundry
 - Fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast and HDMI cord for streaming
- Fitness center
- Communal Lounge

What's Nearby
- 3 minute walk to Frank's Pizza (best spot for New York-style pizza)
- 5 minute walk to Conservatory (eclectic eatery with an outdoor beer garden)
- 6 minute walk to Boomtown Coffee (specializes in small-batch roasted coffees)
- 9 minute walk to Tranquility Park (relaxing park featuring flowing water and unique architecture)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay—while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

more description: Cozy and intimate 1 bedroom apartment in the perfect location! 5 minutes to the world famous Texas Medical Center and NRG Arena. It is situated in a small complex in a lovely neighborhood. If you are looking for a quiet and serene place to work or simply do a vacation, you found the right place. Apartment comes with a comfy queen bed, granite countertops, and a quaint courtyard. Come see for yourself and enjoy our lovely home!The spaceThis 1 bedroom is the perfect home away from home! It is ideal for long stays. It is located in an intimate apartment complex that features free parking, a central courtyard, and onsite maintenance. You'll love this spot if you love tons of natural light!The kitchen has granite countertops with a keurig for a morning brew. The living room has a comfortable sofa that lays out into a full size futon and 50" television with a fire stick. There is also a desk for workspace and a washer and dryer in the unit.

more description: This space is located in 5th ward Houston. Close to all local attractions including;Medical center 1.5 mi, 6 minMuseum of fine arts/Houston children's museum7 mi, 11 minUniversity of Houston 6.2mi, 9 minTexas Southern University 6.6 mi, 13 minRice U 7.4mi, 12 minHobby airport 13.2 mi, 19 minIAH 19.7 mi,27 minMinutemaid/Toyota Center/George R Brown/Discovery Green 3.7 mi, 7 minNRG stadium 11.3 mi, 15 minHouston Zoo/Herman Park 8 mi, 14 minGalleria Mall 12miles, 18 minThe space*The kitchen and bathroom surfaces as well as doorknobs and handles in this space are professionally BLEACH CLEANED in between every visit. BLEACH is the best disinfectant for sanitizing.**Extra attention is paid to sanitizing this space to guard against any contagion.**Please be assured we prioritize and are proactive about protecting our guests' health and safety.*The dictionary definition of the word community is "a feeling of fellowship with others, as a result of sharing common attitudes, interests, and goals." Welcome to our community bungalow in the historic and revitalizing 5th ward of Houston. This charming little bungalow is inspired by community uplift and rejuvenation. The clean and detail oriented design will delight your senses and elevate your spirit. The perfect combination of style and value- this smart bungalow is equipped with; super fast wifi, amazingly comfortable king bed and convertible sofabed, safe and secure access, a stocked kitchen with full cookware and appliances, a workstation and much more! This space is perfect for families, couples, small groups of friends, business and leisure travelers or anyone in search of style and value.This house is located in a community development within a transitioning area of Houston. It is an older home with brand new window units for heating and cooling.

There is free WiFi, coffee, and plenty of space in the kitchen, dining, and living rooms. We are conveniently located near Beltway 8, the 610 loop, and many popular shops and restaurants. You are welcome to stay with us and enjoy your time in Houston!The spaceYour own private room features a bed, and plenty of closet space for you to store your items, and is near to the updated, stylish bathroom. more description: This King Suite Bedroom and 1 Bath Apartment is located in theTexas Medical Center, right across from the NRG Stadium. It is just 15 minutes away from The Galleria and Downtown. Enjoy everything Houston has to offer from parks, museums, shopping malls, coffee shops, and the best restaurants in the city all within 8 minutes. The unit has 5-star amenities including: -Free Parking-Keurig Coffee Maker-High-Speed Wifi-Smart TVs-Gym  -Pool  -Blender  -Toaster  -Washer and DryerThe spaceThis space is perfectly suited for any guests coming for the following reasons:- Medical Patients - You are just 1 mile away from the Med Center!- Medical Staff/ Nurses/Students - Right inside the Medical Hub.- Business professionals- If you’re coming to Houston for business, this place is right in the middle of Houston. - Visitors-The  museum district is literally only 5 minutes away , as well as the best parks and malls!If this is you, look no where else ;)We provide you with a fully furnished King Suite that includes high-speed internet, coffee station, Smart TVs, streaming services, washer and dryers, and several other things!King Suite:Our space is staged to feel like you are right at home. The King bedroom offers a King Pillow Top Mattress with a cozy comforter and both soft and firm pillows. Enjoy the 40 inch 4K UHD Smart TV for you to Netflix and Chill. Kitchen:Our kitchen offers full amenities like a top-grade Keurig, Blender, Toaster, Fridge, Microwave, Cookware, Knife Set, Glassware, and Dinnerware! We provide you with extra amenities like k-cups, tea, creamer, and other kitchen essentials!Living Room:Our Cozy Living Room is beautifully decorated with a 65 in 4K UHD Smart TV, with a comfortable sofa and loveseat for you to kick back and relax.

more description: The space is a detached studio apartment with a private entrance. The room has one queen bed, with a super comfy mattress. There is a full bathroom (standing shower, toilet, and sink) and a large closet. The kitchen has several pots and pans. There is also a dining area to work or eat from.We are proudly powered by 100% renewable energy!The spaceThis is a single story home. It has multiple rooms and we rent out different rooms. All the rooms have private entrances and their own kitchen and bathroom. No one can enter your space. The backyard and garage are common and shared areas. For eg, we have washer dryer in garage area which is shared by everyone. The backyard is open to everyone (which includes  guest pets). All the pictures we have are uploaded on the listing if you scroll. Incase you have a particular question, please message us.

more description:
Diverse cuisines. Art around every corner. Everything is bigger in Texas. Inside you'll find concrete flooring and granite countertops. But it doesn't stop there. Grab a drink downstairs, hit the game room, or lounge by the pool. Texas is nothing without BBQ, and our favorite is the brisket sandwich from the Pit Room. If dancing is more your style, Midtown is your spot. Whatever you choose, your next adventure starts at Mid Main Lofts.The spaceWorking, relaxing, living. Our spaces have all the other essentials you need for your stay.

- Contact-free check-in 
- 24/7 virtual support
- Super-fast WiFi
- Fresh towels and bathroom essentials
- Pre-cleaning before your arrival
- In-suite laundry 
- Fully equipped kitchen
- Chromecast and HDMI cord for streaming
- Fitness center
- Pool
- BBQ facilities
- Lounge and game room
- Outdoor patios in common areas

What's Nearby
- 1 minute walk to MATCH (contemporary performing arts venue with frequent events)
- 3 minute walk to Holman Draft Hall (hip bar offering an extensive draft beer list & pub food)
- 3 minute walk to The Breakfast Klub (best soul food brunch in town!)
- 4 minute drive to Siphon Coffee (cozy morning stop to enjoy a fresh cup of Joe)

We have multiple spaces at this property, each designed to give you a beautiful place to stay — while our style is consistent, the view, layout, and design may vary.

number of guests: 7 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✓ Sleeps 7 with Comfy King Bed  + Queen bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Montrose Apartment (900SQFT)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 5* SUPER host with 9000+ reviews✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 1GBPs fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.Houston – West University Place area modern theme Getaway with entire 900 square feet recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 Queen bed, 2 twin beds and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $30 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy West University Place/River Oak area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new Kroger Foods, HEB, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog , Present Company Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) –• El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!)• Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• Flagship Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• 2 Starbuck's• Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks TheaterUnder 8 minute Uber will you to –• Central Downtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer.We do charge $18 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.

more description: Studio 1 is decorated with simple and eclectic furnishings, has a new Queen BeautyRest mattress with soft sheets, large screen TV and the best restaurants, bars within minutes on foot + only a short drive to Museum District, NRG, downtown and the Medical Center. Park JJ is great for groups. Contact me for rates.  **PETS ALLOW FOR A NON REFUNDABLE FEE**  Please notify property manager. If we find out there were pets the will double from $35.00 to $70.00The spaceStudio 1 is a great open space with all the modern amenities needed while traveling:   high speed internet, large 50" Smart TV, a petite kitchen with a coffee maker, complimentary coffee, microwave, refrigerator and a setting for two including silverware.  There is not oven or stove, but we can provide a burner or request. Snuggle into luxuriously soft bamboo sheets or sit at the desk that includes easy access outlets and Wi-Fi.  The bathrooms include Trader Joe's shampoo and conditioner, hand soap as well as a hair dryer and fluffy towels.

name: Apartment in Southwest Houston

number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This comfy studio apartment is the perfect place for for you to book your trip to Houston. Whether you're in town for a business trip, or you're coming down for a visit to the medical center, this space is perfect for you!The king memory foam mattress will instantly put you at peace, giving you a good nights rest that you deserve.Enjoy a movie or show on the 60" inch HD Smart TV while relaxing on the sofa that also pulls out into a full size bed.This unit is just minutes away from TMC!The spaceThis space is perfectly suited for any guests coming for the following reasons:- Medical Patients - You are just a block away from the Med Center!- Medical Staff/ Nurses/Students - Right inside the Medical Hub.- Business professionals- If you’re coming to Houston for business, this place is right in the middle of Houston. - Visitors- The museum district, food scene, malls and all the fun things too do in Houston are all super close to you!If this is you, look no where else ;)Master Bedroom:Our space is staged to make you feel like you are right at home. The master bedroom offers an insanely comfortable King Memory Foam Mattress with a luxurious comforter and both soft and firm pillows. The reading lamps have USB ports so you don't have too bend down to look for an outlet!Living Room:Our Cozy Living Room is beautifully decorated with a 60" inch 4K UHD Smart TV, a comfortable sofa that pulls out to a full bed, and accent pieces to make you feel right at home.- 60" inch HD Smart TV- Pull out Sofa SectionalKitchen Amenities include:- Oven- Stove- Fridge- Dishwasher- Sink- Keurig- Blender- Toaster- Fridge- Microwave- Cookware- Knife Set- Glassware- Dinnerware- Vacuum/Mop/BroomBathroom:This spacious bathroom is stocked with all the essential toiletries, so you don't have to worry about packing anything extra.- Full Body Mirror- Bath Towels- Hand Towels- Wash Clothes- Makeup Remover- Toothpaste- Shampoo/Conditioner- Body wash- Bath/Shower- Hot and Cold waterOther great things include:- Blazing Fast Wi-Fi!- Air Bed for extra guests- All Streaming Services such as Netflix, Disney Plus, HBO Max, Hulu, and several more!Health, the safety and well-being of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reason, we use a thorough and extensive process of cleaning after each check-out.In case your preferred dates are already taken, please check our profile as we offer more listings in the city.Experience the heart of Houston from this comfy King Studio Suite. We are looking forward to your arrival!

more description: Save our listing now by pressing the heart in the upper right hand corner of this page.✓ Comfy queen bed and large sofa bed, boutique apartment (550sq ft)✓ Walk score 88✓ Well suited for couple's getaway and Med center visit✓ 5* SUPER host with 250+ reviews✓ 43” 4k Smart TV with Amazon Fire and Netflix✓ 1GB secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, microwave, stove, washing machine, dishwasher✓ Boutique hotel✓ Family owned✓ Self check-in ✓ 2 miles: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium, Med Center, ZooThe spaceYou'll love the chic interior decor, the fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and the open-concept layout that maintains a warm and welcoming vibe. Located in Montrose, known for it's eclectic vibe and beautiful architecture, you're surrounded by hip boutiques, delicious restaurants, and lively bars and entertainment.I wanted to provide a centrally located apartment that was luxurious and clean but still affordable for most. The apartment is inside the loop located 5 minutes from the Galleria, West University and River Oaks.Amenities include keyless entry, assigned parking, Nest climate control, plush towels, shampoo, body wash, coffee, quartz counter tops, cable TV, Amazon Fire TV, brand new queen size bed, washer and dryer.

description: Casa Tequilana Art Nouveau Bungalow with free WiFi
name: Bungalow in Oak Forest - Garden Oaks
unit rental details: Entire bungalow hosted by Diego4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1.5 baths
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1.5 baths**__**Joined in July 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to @casatequilana-my Art Nouveau Bungalow masterpiece of style and design, inspired by iconic and warm landscapes of American artist Georgia O’Keeffe. At a full 900 square feet, you'll be able to go outside and enjoy the South Texas weather underneath the string lights for a magical experience. All in the peace,  comfort, and privacy of your own courtyard! :)Work from home? My bungalow has the space to help you feel at ease while enjoying the designer and upscale finishes throughout!The spaceAs seen in @houstoniamagazine & @voyagehoustonmag, My newly constructed Nouveau Bungalow is located in the up-and-coming Oak Forest/Independence heights! Just 15 minutes from downtown Houston. The high 11' ceilings will make this space feel larger than your usual bungalow stays. It's got an open and airy layout that can accommodate up to 4 people.The home is furnished with one queen sized bed in the room and one queen-sized memory foam sleeper sofa. (You can decide how you guys want to paper rock scissor for who's sleeping where - ha!)My water has a 6 tier soft water filtration system that will have your skin and hair feeling like its been through some spa-level treatment! Oh and we also have tap service Alkaline water to ensure proper hydration during your stay. AND to top things off we also include a space tech air purifier to help provide you with quality sleep.Inside the kitchen, you'll find all of the silverware, pots, pans, and plates you'll need to pretend like you're not going just going to relax and order in!The living room is furnished with a nice flat-screen tv where you'll be able to watch Netflix, Peacock or whatever streaming service there is in the future.In terms of amenities, we've got you covered! And if we're missing anything please let us know so we can make your next stay better than your last!As mentioned before my casa is equipped with some great energy and art all around you that'll inspire you to stay forever.

name: Apartment in Downtown Houston
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Vince4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: A balance of sophisticated and comfortable, luxurious and laid back, this is a place where expectations aren’t just met, they’re exceeded. Needs aren’t simply addressed, they’re personally attended to. Our residents don’t just live here, they belong.The spaceExplore this one bedroom downtown Houston apartment to find open-concept floor plans. Steps away from your front door, you’ll have exclusive access to community amenities designed to bring your vision of luxury living to life, high above the city lights of downtown Houston.This is everything Houston high rise apartment living should be. And, through our unmatched lifestyle upgrades, it’s your own personal awakening to the reality of what home truly can be.You’ll never have nothing to do.Our goal is to go above and beyond to make your life more enjoyable, so we’ve developed an impressive list of unmatched amenities to complement our luxury high-rise apartments in Houston, and bring ease back into your lifestyle. Start your morning with a virtual class in our sky studio and gym featuring state-of-the-art equipment. Then, catch up with friends over drinks on the rooftop lounge with bar service. For a truly decadent experience, cap off your day in our spa, which comes complete with sauna, steam, and massage rooms. Designed to cater to a variety of interests and lifestyles, we proudly offer you more of everything. Because we believe that’s exactly what you deserve.Committed to your needs and focused on your convenience, we bring a passionate professionalism to serving you.Vehicle ValetConciergePackage Delivery DeskValet Dry CleaningPet Walking, Sitting and GroomingRelaxation and EntertainmentConveniently located in downtown Houston’s entertainment district, you’ll still have plenty to do without ever leaving the building.Infinity Deck with a Glass Bottom Pool Suspended Out Over the Streets of Downtown HoustonOutdoor Lounge Areas with Grilling Spaces and Fire PitPalm Terrace Heated Pool and Spa with CabanasVeranda Grilling Space with Outdoor Kitchen and Fire PitGame Room with Air Hockey, Skee-Ball, Ping-Pong and Arcade GamesBilliards RoomPoker SuiteIndoor Basketball CourtVirtual Golf SimulatorMovie TheatreChildren’s PlayroomGrand Ballroom with Catering KitchenDemonstration KitchenTemperature-controlled Wine Room with Private LockersSpa Relaxation Room with Men’s and Women’s Locker RoomsSteam, Sauna and Massage RoomsSunless Tanning SuiteSky Lounge with Bar ServicesFitness and Professional SpacesMarket Square Tower’s spaces offer the opportunity for self-improvement, whether it be physically or professionally.Sky Gym with State-Of-The-Art Fitness EquipmentSky Studio with Virtual Class OfferingsSky Room for Private Dining or Business MeetingsCyber LoungeExecutive Conference RoomOther AmenitiesAdditional amenities are designed to increase convenience and accommodate your personal needs.CVS Pharmacy and GroceryUpgraded Connectivity to Guarantee Cell Phone Reception Throughout PropertyBicycle Storage with Repair StationFully-Equipped Pet Grooming RoomResident Storage Units

more description: Bookings after Oct 1, Long term rental 14-30 day minimum. Travel nurses and medical patients welcome. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place in the museum district. Luxury at its finest. Feel at home in this exclusive first floor unit! Close proximity to Medical Center, Downtown,Montrose,Midtown, Hermann Park, museums, 59, 288 and the metro rail. Off street parking available.The spaceBeautifully remodeled boutique building offers modern finishes, quartz countertops, custom fixtures & hardware, gas range, vent hood, new, central air and heat, great windows & natural light. Luxury furniture and finishes. Fully gated corner lot with front grassed space. Refrigerator and full size washer & dryer included in unit. One king size bed and sofa bed. Spacious and lux. Dedicated office space. Central air and heat, original hardwood floors.

more description: This comfy studio apartment is the perfect place for for you to book your trip to Houston. Whether you're in town for a business trip, or you're coming down for a visit to the medical center, this space is perfect for you!The king memory foam mattress will instantly put you at peace, giving you a good nights rest that you deserve. Enjoy a movie or show on the 60" inch HD Smart TV while relaxing on the sofa that also pulls out into a full size bed.- Beach Volleyball- Gym- Pool- BballThe spaceThis space is perfectly suited for any guests coming for the following reasons:- Medical Patients - You are just a block away from the Med Center!- Medical Staff/ Nurses/Students - Right inside the Medical Hub.- Business professionals- If you’re coming to Houston for business, this place is right in the middle of Houston. - Visitors- The museum district, food scene, malls and all the fun things too do in Houston are all super close to you!If this is you, look no where else ;)Master Bedroom:Our space is staged to make you feel like you are right at home. The master bedroom offers an insanely comfortable King Memory Foam Mattress with a luxurious comforter and both soft and firm pillows. The reading lamps have USB ports so you don't have too bend down to look for an outlet!Living Room:Our Cozy Living Room is beautifully decorated with a 60" inch 4K UHD Smart TV, a comfortable sofa that pulls out to a full bed, and accent pieces to make you feel right at home.- 60" inch HD Smart TV- Pull out Sofa SectionalKitchen Amenities include:- Oven- Stove- Fridge- Dishwasher- Sink- Keurig- Blender- Toaster- Fridge- Microwave- Cookware- Knife Set- Glassware- Dinnerware- Vacuum/Mop/BroomBathroom:This spacious bathroom is stocked with all the essential toiletries, so you don't have to worry about packing anything extra.- Full Body Mirror- Bath Towels- Hand Towels- Wash Clothes- Makeup Remover- Toothpaste- Shampoo/Conditioner- Body wash- Bath/Shower- Hot and Cold waterOther great things include:- Blazing Fast Wi-Fi!- Air Bed for extra guests- All Streaming Services such as Netflix, Disney Plus, HBO Max, Hulu, and several more!Health, the safety and well-being of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reason, we use a thorough and extensive process of cleaning after each check-out.In case your preferred dates are already taken, please check our profile as we offer more listings in the city.Experience the heart of Houston from this comfy King Studio Suite. We are looking forward to your arrival!

more description: Welcome to "Aqua Times," our newly renovated, bright, modern-style, gated home. Nestled in the Heights, 2 miles away from downtown, our home is just minutes away from all the attractions Houston has to offer such as the Aquarium and Minute Maid Park. Sink into our King-Sized memory foam mattresses after a long day of travel/entertainment, and start your days off with a fresh cup of coffee from our signature coffee station and delicious treats from the nearby Target located just 2 miles away!The spaceOur home features amazing natural lighting that you can adjust with blinds on all windows. King-sized bed in primary, queen-sized beds in all other rooms and a roll away twin-sized memory foam bed are provided. A spacious open-concept kitchen with new stainless steel appliances: refrigerator, glass counter-top stove, garbage disposal, dishwasher, microwave, oven, and toaster, plus our signature coffee station and BRITA water filter (to make it feel like home!). Basic cooking and cleaning supplies are included such as pots, pans, salt, pepper, cooking spray, Lysol wipes, multipurpose spray, broom and vacuum making this home perfect for long term stays. For business travelers, don't worry we have you covered, iron and ironing board as well as in-house washer and dryer are provided! Roku integrated TVs in primary and living room so bring your streaming accounts! Our home is located in an unbeatable location surrounded by great food, attractions and nightlife while also being practical for those here for business!~ 2 miles from the nearest Target~ 2 miles from Downtown Houston~ 2 miles from Minute Maid Park~ 2 miles from the Houston Aquarium~ 8 miles from the Houston Medical Center~ 18 miles from Bush International AirportDiscounts offered on long term stays! What are you waiting for? Come book with us today!

more description: Downtown Moody Heights Houston: Elegant 1 bedroom, 1 bath w/yard. Electric gate & full home burglar alarm system w/outside cameras.  Parking for 4.  Outside lounge patio area with hammock, stainless steel appliances and fully equipped kitchen, hardwood floors, granite counter tops throughout, large walk-in closet, Fullsize Washer&Dryer. WiFi Color Printer. METRO Rt 44 bus stop at corner, bike trails nearby. 1 mile to Downtown, less than 4 miles from Museum District. Couples Bikes on-site.The spaceThis is a fully renovated 1 bedroom house (extremly clean) with a large patio and yard.  There is a very comfortable sleep number queen size bed and a full size sleeper sofa. Full size stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including a Starbucks Coffee machine, full size tea kettle and electric wine opener.  The place has high ceilings, lots of natural light with beautiful artwork by a local artist.  This place is great for couples, business travelers and those with small pets.  The property is fully gated and includes a whole house security system. Parking is inside the  property (3/4vehicles). Double patio doors open directly to the deck with patio furniture and hammock. Ladies cruiser bike on-site to use on local bike paths, gym and bike to Target store.

This stay is perfect for guests and small groups to enjoy all that Houston has to offer.We cant wait to host you!

more description: ✓ Sleeps 7 with Comfy King Bed  + Queen bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Montrose Apartment (900SQFT)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 5* SUPER host with 9000+ reviews✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 1GBPs fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.Houston – West University Place area modern theme Getaway with entire 900 square feet recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 Queen bed, 2 twin beds and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $30 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy West University Place/River Oak area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new Kroger Foods, HEB, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog , Present Company Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) –• El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!)• Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• Flagship Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• 2 Starbuck's• Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks TheaterUnder 8 minute Uber will you to –• Central Downtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer.We do charge $18 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.

name: Apartment in Neartown - Montrose
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sarah5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 4 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 4 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✓ Comfy King Bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Montrose Apartment (700 sq ft)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 5* SUPER host with 8800+ reviews✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 500MBPS fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Secured Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $20 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.Houston – Lower Montrose/Heights area modern theme Getaway with entire 1000 square feet recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.One  bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 sofa bed & 1 double bed and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→  We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $20 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy Lower Montrose/River Oaks/Heights area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new Kroger Foods, HEB, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog (3 mins walk), Present Company (Bar 3 mins walk), Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) – • El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!) • Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• Flagship Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• 2 Starbuck's • Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks TheaterUnder 8 minute Uber will you to – • Central Downtown • Museum District • U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer. We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.→ Montrose was named one of the "ten great neighborhoods in America" for its demographic diversity, renovated mansions, bungalows with wide porches, and cottages located along tree-lined boulevards.

This luxurious house sleeps 14, giving you the experience of a mid-century modern get-away. Enjoy cozy couches, sleek yet whimsical finishes and resort style en-suites. It has a a full sized kitchen that includes: stainless steel dishwasher,  gas stove, and oversized fridge and washer-dryer. Bring friends. Bring family. MAKE MEMORIES!The space2 bedrooms with 2 queen beds and full sized en-suites. We have two couches that can be used for sleeping areas. We  also have 4 extra air mattresses for additional guests. (1 King, 2 Queens & 1 Full that can sleep 2 people each). Spacious Full-sized kitchen and dining area. Latest stackable dryer and washer for guests. Designated work-space desks for both adults and children. Large front and back patios. Huge Back yard with a upstairs patio with fun hanging chairs for a mini hammock feel and gatherings.

Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place in the museum district. Luxury at its finest. Feel at home in this exclusive first floor unit! Close proximity to Medical Center, Downtown,Montrose,Midtown, Hermann Park, museums, 59, 288 and the metro rail. Off street parking available.The spaceBeautifully remodeled boutique building offers modern finishes, quartz countertops, custom fixtures & hardware, gas range, vent hood, new, central air and heat, great windows & natural light. Luxury furniture and finishes. Fully gated corner lot with front grassed space. Refrigerator and full size washer & dryer included in unit. One king size bed and sofa bed. Spacious and lux. Dedicated office space. Central air and heat, original hardwood floors.

description: Private- Luxuries Condo | Near Memorial & Galleria
name: Condo in Northwest Houston
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted by Leticia4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in December 2019**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Beautiful, private and exclusive condo tucked in the highly sought-after Memorial area. This cozy condo consists of two floors. The first floor features a large, comfortable, brand-new sectional. A 65-inch TV with Netflix, Hulu and Amazon. A spacious, 4 seating dining room table. Beautiful French doors that lead into our private terrace and a full kitchen. This gem is perfect for your weekend getaway, business trip, or pleasure leisureThe spaceThis 2-story condo, hidden in a treelined, exclusive community is in the perfect location. Conveniently located near I-10 and 610, you're only a few minutes away from Memorial City Mall, Galleria, River Oaks. This condo offers the luxury of a quiet community, yet near all the central attractions Houston has to offer. The space is located in the corner with large floor to ceiling windows, offering plenty of natural lighting. As you enter, you'll be greeted by a small but natured filled patio. Once in the unit, you'll enjoy our full-sized, brand-new sectional. A 65-inch TV with Netflix, Hulu & Amazon. As you move into our dining area, you'll find a spacious, brand new, 4 seating dining room table. Gorgeous French doors that lead into our private terrace. Once in the kitchen, you'll find a fully loaded kitchen, with a gas stove, microwave, fridge, freezer, pots, pans, glassware, silverware, knife ware and all other necessities for your culinary inspirations. The second floor offers an open concept, with a full-sized mirror and a queen-sized bed. Newly renovated bathroom with a stand-up shower and tub. A skyline illuminates the bathroom with plenty of natural light. You'll also find 2 full sized closets, a washer and dryer and floor to ceiling windows.

Make yourself at home once you arrive. We do not provide any tv cable or streaming services. However, we do offer Roku TV's with apps like Netflix, Prime, Hulu, and more! Feel free to log into the apps with your own log in and enjoy!

description: The Jungle Disco, Private Heated Pool, 3 King BD
name: Home in Neartown - Montrose
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Andrew8 guests ·  · 4 bedrooms ·  · 5 beds ·  · 2.5 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 4 bedrooms · **__** · 5 beds · **__** · 2.5 baths**__**Joined in December 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Follow the “Call of the Disco Ball” into the heart of the Jungle Disco, a groovy, animal-themed hideout with a heated atrium pool nestled conveniently in the Museum District. Sip coffee poolside in the morning, kick back for a tiger nap in the Canopy Room, entertain in the high-end living area that features the perfect Insta wall, and end your day unwinding in the Jungle Lagoon.  The Jungle Disco is the perfect spot for a getaway or staycation in the city!The spaceThe Jungle Disco is a uniquely-constructed, two-story, four (4) bedroom home that can sleep up to eight (8) guests.  Three bedrooms are outfitted with king beds while the fourth bedroom features a bunk bed (twin-over-full).  All beds come equipped with Zinus mattresses covered by 3-inch, copper-infused eggshell mattress toppers.We aim to ensure jungles worldwide are preserved in their natural state.  This is why each stay at the Jungle Disco is Verra-certified as carbon-negative.The Jungle Disco sports two interior atriums that allow for an outdoor 'jungle' experience while in the city.  The space was fully remodeled in 2021 with high-end finishes and appliances.   Pool heating is optional; the Host will provide pool heating for an optional fee of $50/day (must be requested for full stay duration) with 48-hour advance notice to allow the Host time to turn on the heater and for the pool to reach the desired temperature before Guest arrival.Note: We do not allow parties, smoking of any kind, or pets on the property.  Please see House Rules for additional details.

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 shared bath**__**Joined in March 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: If prime location is what you're looking for, look no further! Welcome to your en-suite private room just minutes away from some of Houston's most popular attractions, including Minute Maid Park, Toyota Center, BBVA Stadium, Discovery Green, GRB Convention Center and more.Located in trendy "EaDo" you are minutes from the light rail with easy access to nearby hot spots like midtown, downtown, NRG Arena, UofH and many spots in between. It's the perfect getaway for travelers of every kind.The spaceBuilt in 2022, this brand new home offers high end upgrades and modern finishes, providing a truly luxury travel experience. In addition to large tiled walk-in shower, quartz countertops and lush carpeting, the room offers everything you need to feel at home, including a queen memory foam bed, feather and down fill comforters and pillows and in-swing French doors that open to a petite, private patio space.  You will have the entire first floor suite to yourself that includes your private shower/bathroom and backyard patio area. Located on a quiet street in one jof the hottest spots in Houston, you can enjoy the downtown views and city life while maintaining your peace and privacy within this gated address. With a functional writing desk, 4k smart TV (Netflix, Hulu, Prime, etc), Wi-Fi, mini-fridge, mini-freezer and microwave coupled with free, available street parking, dozens of restaurants, coffee shops and venues nearby, you'll have no problem settling in!Convenient street parking is available right outside the gated entry of the home community. A special gate code and front door code will be provided to you upon booking for easy in and out access. ***This is 1 of 2 Airbnb rooms I host in the home. The rooms are on separate floors so crossing paths with other friendly travelers is unlikely. The only time you may potentially cross paths with other guests is either entering or exiting the home.

There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.Houston – Montrose area modern theme Getaway studio unit (500 sqft), recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.Sleeps 2 on very comfortable KING sized bed. Open living and kitchen, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, tile floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $30 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy Montrose/West University Place/River Oaks area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new HEB, Trader Joes, West Alabama Ice House, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog , and Present Company. Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) –• El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!)• Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• H-E-B, Trader Joes, Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• Starbucks• Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks Theater<8 minute Uber ride will take you to –• Downtown• Midtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooLocated right next to the highway allows you to easily travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Katy, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc. So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Plenty of FREE street parking is available. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in Houston.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 88, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer.We do charge $18 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.

more description: You'll be impressed by the high standard of comfort in this cozy suite. Its central location in Houston makes it an excellent choice for a relaxing getaway. We think it's the best place to stay if you want to see and do everything the area has to offer in style and convenience. The time has come for you to be moved to action! You're in close proximity to some amazing places. Finally, a surefire way to unwind and have fun. Throughout the entire day.The spaceWhat is it about this suite that appeals to us so much? It has a straightforward design that allows for a maximum of six occupants. The walk-in closet has two air mattresses available for you to use if you find that you require them.You will immediately feel as comfortable as a cloud thanks to our sofa chair and futon that are designed in a vintage manner. We wanted our guests to feel like they were in a living room with family or friends, so we equipped the living room with standing food trays and a GIANT 55-inch Smart TV. Here, you can watch the latest shows, movies, and news, and you can even go on YouTube to learn new tik toks.We want our guests' most productive days to start with drinks made in our coffee maker or blender. We also keep silverware, pots, pans, plates, mugs, bowls, and cooking tools so that we can make the best home-cooked meals. What's the point of a nice suite if it doesn't have a great kitchen that's fully stocked?We want our guests to be able to get simple items without having to go far, so we decided to invest in a personal washer and dryer and provide expert maintenance support for it. This will ensure that your clothing are always clean and ready to be worn.It is much simpler to maintain the temperature exactly where you want it when you have a heating and cooling system that is centrally located.You can use our Keratin body wash and conditioner at any time of the day to calm and refresh your skin. Our luxury white towels wrap around your body, and our hand-made bathroom rug catches your feet before they hit the cold floor. Our full bathroom is equipped with toilet paper, eco-friendly hand soap, a classic vanity mirror, and a high-pressure shower head that can be removed.After a stressful day at work, you may unwind on our private patio during the day and turn on our highlighted flame light in the evening to transform the space into a more intimate setting that is ideal for romance or unwinding.You can keep your mind and body sharp by going to our gym, which is next to the pool area. Full of cardio and weight-lifting machines, so you can get in a solid exercise without being trapped in traffic or taking too much time away from your schedule. Your body is the most important site of worship?OTHER FEATURES• A separate, private location in your home that is equipped with both a computer and Wi-Fi and serves as a dedicated workspace for when you are working from home.• A high-definition television with a screen measuring 55 inches that comes equipped with Disney+, HBO Max, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Hulu, and Roku so that you can watch all of your favorite shows.• Outdoor dining areaOn-site parking is provided at no cost to guests.• The structure is equipped with surveillance cameras.• Detectors for both smoke and fire; alarms• The washing and dryer are located inside, and they also have a terrace outside where they are located.• Free use of fitness equipment such as treadmills, weights, stationary cycles, and more

more description: 🔥LOCATION LOCATION!! Forget your worries in this peaceful and serene space. Enjoy your private balcony, covered and underground garage , pool, gym, media center, wine room and business lounge. Located in a GREAT area. 8 mins from The Galleria Mall, 1 minute away from Starbucks, Meyerland, and NRG stadium. 5-10 minutes away from all of Houston’s most popular restaurants, shopping centers, plazas, and tourist attractions. This is the perfect location  come & see what Houston has to offer!The spaceRelax at the modern and comfy 1 BR apt nestled in a luxurious apartment complex. Its prime Houston location lets you easily explore top restaurants, the Galleria mall, and attractions. The elegant design and a rich amenity list will satisfy your every need.✔ Comfortable King Bed✔Open Design Living✔ Smart TVs with Netflix, Hulu✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi✔ Access to Community Amenities (Gym, Business lounge, Wine room, Media center Pool + More)A blend of comfort, style, and convenience greets you as soon as you step inside this elegant apartment. While decorating this inviting retreat, we have worked hard to create a "2nd home" feeling for our guests. The living area is the apartment's heartbeat, successfully combining the lively living room with a sitting area and the fully equipped kitchen. The windows and balcony doors allow for plenty of natural light to illuminate the space throughout the day. Together with the bright wooden floors and tasteful décor, create a feeling of warmth and coziness. The comfortable bedroom is designed to offer all the rest you need after a long day of exploring Houston, Texas.★ LIVING ROOM ★Enjoy in this inviting and comfortable setting where you will have everything needed to relax in complete serenity.✔Comfortable Leather sofa✔ Smart TV with Netflix, & Hulu✔ Stylish Coffee Tables✔ Comfy Sofa Chair✔ Access to the Balcony★ KITCHEN & DINING ★Even the most demanding of chefs would enjoy preparing delicious meals using numerous state-of-the-art cooking appliances. In addition, spacious granite countertops and the vast kitchen island provide plenty of workspaces for you to prepare delicious homemade delicacies.✔ Microwave✔ Stove✔ Oven✔ Refrigerator/Freezer with Water Dispenser✔ Dishwasher✔ Coffee Maker with Complimentary Pods✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water✔ Glasses✔ Silverware✔ Pots & PansServe those delicious meals directly on the kitchen island. If you are looking for a more formal dining setting, the inviting table is next to the kitchen.✔ Kitchen Island with Seating for 2 ★ BEDROOM ★The tastefully furnished bedroom is designed to provide hotel-like comfort and convenience needed to relax and rest so you can remain energized and do everything you have planned the next day.✔ King-Size Bed with Pillows, Linens, and Sheets✔ Smart TV with Netflix, & Hulu✔ Walk-In Closet with Hangers and Shelves✔ Cabinet with Spacious Drawers✔ Night Stand with a Reading Light✔ Ensuite Bathroom with a Shower.★ BATHROOMS ★The apartment features an inviting full bathroom, accessible directly from the bedroom. The bathroom is stocked with all essential toiletries for your maximum convenience. ✔ Shower Cabin✔ Mirror✔ Toilet✔ Towels✔ Hair Dryer✔ Essential Toiletries★ BALCONY ★Step out to the private balcony to catch some fresh air, soak up the sun, and feel the pulse of the neighborhood.✔ Seating Area with Table and ChairsLook no further than our serene home for your memorable visit to Houston, Texas We are looking forward to you experiencing it in its complete comfort and coziness.Guest accessThe entire apartment is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home.Other than the already mentioned amenities, the house also features:✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi✔ Air Conditioning✔ Heating✔ Washer+ Dryer✔ Iron The apartment is a part of the upscale luxury apartment complex, allowing our guests access to many state-of-the-art luxury facilities and amenities.✔ 24-Hour Fitness Club.✔ Bike Storage ✔ Clubroom with Billiards, TV's, Kitchen/✔ 2nd Floor Outdoor Lounge with Comfy Seating and Pool✔ Free ParkingOther things to note★ NO PETS ★Although we adore animals, our apartment is not equipped to accommodate your furry friends.★ NO PARTIES ALLOWED ★We kindly ask you to respect the apartment, neighbors, and house rules by not throwing any sorts of parties or large gatherings. Any loud noises outside acceptable hours will be reported, and you will be asked to vacate the premises. Thank you very much for your understanding.★ BACKGROUND CHECK REQUIRED ★To remain compliant with our apartment community and ensure the safety of all guests, a background check is required if the duration of your stay is 3 days.★ COVID-19 SANITIZATION ★Heath, safety, and wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reason, we use a thorough process of cleaning after each check-out.

more description: Abode is helping to pioneer the transformation of hospitality. We're combining exceptional spaces with the convenience & next-level service found in upscale hotels. Abodes are design-forward, tech-optimized, & curated to give travelers a truly home-like experience. By giving travelers convenient access to authentic living experiences in the most desirable neighborhoods Abode has created a hospitality experience that resonates with guests by merging the best attributes of home-sharing & hotels.The spaceWe’re working hard to keep our Abodes safe and open to anyone who needs them. Check-in is seamless, with no lines to stand in or people to meet to ensure our guests can limit their interaction with others. We are implementing rigorous additional cleaning and sanitizing procedures before and after each stay, providing extra soap in the homes for personal hygiene, and fully stocked with cleaning supplies and paper goods. Our team is dedicated to assisting our guests and are available at any time, day or night.This home is a spacious 1 bedroom with private access. It boasts a fully-appointed kitchen, ensuite washer/dryer, heating & air conditioning, and 1 full en-suite bathroom with step-in shower.BATH• Fully appointed bathroom with step in shower• Eco-conscious, cruelty-free shampoo, conditioner, soap, and body wash provided. • Hairdryer• Please note, there is no bathtubEAT• New remodeled modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances. Kitchens are fully equipped and include dishware, flatware, glassware, pots, pans, and ovenware.  • Appliances include 4-top electric stove and oven, microwave, refrigerator with freezer, pour-over coffee carafe and water kettle, traditional coffee maker, toaster, and blender.ENTERTAINMENT• Your Abode is equipped with a smart TV or streaming device (Roku) which allows guests to access their own streaming accounts that are automatically logged out at checkout. Your Abode does not have cable or satellite service but the streaming device does provide some free TV and movie content.  NOTABLE EXTRAS• Luxury Decor by West Elm, CB2, Casper• High-speed internet• Smart Nest thermostats• White noise machines for light sleepers• Bedside USB multi-port charger• Full Kitchen perfectly stocked for a chef's delight• Walk to dozens of shops, restaurants, and public transportation

more description: A balance of sophisticated and comfortable, luxurious and laid back, this is a place where expectations aren’t just met, they’re exceeded. Needs aren’t simply addressed, they’re personally attended to. Our residents don’t just live here, they belong.The spaceExplore this one bedroom downtown Houston apartment to find open-concept floor plans. Steps away from your front door, you’ll have exclusive access to community amenities designed to bring your vision of luxury living to life, high above the city lights of downtown Houston.This is everything Houston high rise apartment living should be. And, through our unmatched lifestyle upgrades, it’s your own personal awakening to the reality of what home truly can be.You’ll never have nothing to do.Our goal is to go above and beyond to make your life more enjoyable, so we’ve developed an impressive list of unmatched amenities to complement our luxury high-rise apartments in Houston, and bring ease back into your lifestyle. Start your morning with a virtual class in our sky studio and gym featuring state-of-the-art equipment. Then, catch up with friends over drinks on the rooftop lounge with bar service. For a truly decadent experience, cap off your day in our spa, which comes complete with sauna, steam, and massage rooms. Designed to cater to a variety of interests and lifestyles, we proudly offer you more of everything. Because we believe that’s exactly what you deserve.Committed to your needs and focused on your convenience, we bring a passionate professionalism to serving you.Vehicle ValetConciergePackage Delivery DeskValet Dry CleaningPet Walking, Sitting and GroomingRelaxation and EntertainmentConveniently located in downtown Houston’s entertainment district, you’ll still have plenty to do without ever leaving the building.Infinity Deck with a Glass Bottom Pool Suspended Out Over the Streets of Downtown HoustonOutdoor Lounge Areas with Grilling Spaces and Fire PitPalm Terrace Heated Pool and Spa with CabanasVeranda Grilling Space with Outdoor Kitchen and Fire PitGame Room with Air Hockey, Skee-Ball, Ping-Pong and Arcade GamesBilliards RoomPoker SuiteIndoor Basketball CourtVirtual Golf SimulatorMovie TheatreChildren’s PlayroomGrand Ballroom with Catering KitchenDemonstration KitchenTemperature-controlled Wine Room with Private LockersSpa Relaxation Room with Men’s and Women’s Locker RoomsSteam, Sauna and Massage RoomsSunless Tanning SuiteSky Lounge with Bar ServicesFitness and Professional SpacesMarket Square Tower’s spaces offer the opportunity for self-improvement, whether it be physically or professionally.Sky Gym with State-Of-The-Art Fitness EquipmentSky Studio with Virtual Class OfferingsSky Room for Private Dining or Business MeetingsCyber LoungeExecutive Conference RoomOther AmenitiesAdditional amenities are designed to increase convenience and accommodate your personal needs.CVS Pharmacy and GroceryUpgraded Connectivity to Guarantee Cell Phone Reception Throughout PropertyBicycle Storage with Repair StationFully-Equipped Pet Grooming RoomResident Storage Units

more description: • Interior designed specifically for tiffany color with vintage fridge and microwave for Montrose getaway experience (650 sqft)• Custom made quartz countertop in the kitchen with personalized theme back splash• 49" 4K cable, Netflix, Amazon, Hulu TV, HBO• Blazing fast secured WiFi • Minutes from Montrose fame bars, restaurants, Med Center, Convention center, Theater District, & Downtown• Private access entrance in a walkable neighborhood with acclaimed restaurants, bars, and attractionsThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.→ Great LOCATION - Close to CVS, bars, restaurants, attractions, including Jones Hall, Wortham Center, Alley Theater downtown→ Reserved parking is available please IM me for spot number.→ If you like designated parking spot in complex, please let us know in 3 days advance. → 2.4 miles ($8 Uber) to George R Brown Convention Center→ 1 mile ($4 Uber) to Museum of Fine Arts. → We absolutely do not allow smoking in the apartment and you will be asked to leave if found smoking inside the apartment and will require $200 smoke cleaning fees. → We honor the quiet hours system from 10PM.→  We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.
