more description: My "pied a terre" is located in the southern end of the popular midtown area of Houston known for its restaurants and nightlife and is also part of the designated Museum Park neighborhood known for its proximity to the museums and Herman Park. The nearby rail line can easily take you to the Medical Center,  downtown, museums, Rice University, and Herman Park.The spaceA studio style guest room. There is a seating area, a desk area, and a queen sized bed. There is NO kitchen but there is a small refrigerator, microwave, and a coffee maker for your use. There is also a wall mounted television with cable and internet for your computer needs.

description: Lodgeur | Picture-perfect studio loft | Midtown
name: Apartment in Midtown
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Lodgeur2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This brand new Lodgeur listing (January 2022) is a spacious 512 SF studio loft apartment on the fourth floor, featuring polished concrete floors and urban loft-style steel ceilings. It is located in Mid Main Lofts, a trendy 2016 apartment complex located in Houston's Midtown Cultural Arts and Entertainment District.In Houston's most walkable neighborhood, you’ll be close to theaters, galleries, shops, restaurants, bars, art, music, Whole Foods, and more. But you’ll also be in your own urban oasis overlooking a one-acre courtyard and pool. There’s a METRORail station right outside, and it’s 3-stops to the Houston Medical Center or Downtown (Transit Score of 75 and a Walk Score of 90).  Guests will have access to the following amenities:     * Secure resident parking is included at no charge  * A 24-hour fitness center with strength and cardio conditioning equipment, along with yoga and Crossfit studio  * Swimming pool with sun terrace and loungers  * One-acre recreational courtyard featuring grilling stations  * Multiple residents’ lounges, that include a large and cozy fireplace, pool table, classic arcade games, and TVs Each Lodgeur listing is fully equipped for both short and extended stays:     * A self-check-in process to make social distancing easier    * A comfortable king-size bed, soft sheets, and a selection of pillows for the perfect night's sleep  * Toiletries from MALIN+GOETZ, plush bath, and pool towels, a hairdryer and hair straightener / flat iron  * A well-lit desk and fast internet, a Bluetooth speaker  * Smart TVs to watch local channels or to stream from your favorite provider  * Fully equipped kitchens: coffee maker, kettle, toaster, blender, tri-ply cookware, rice cooker, Crock-Pot slow cooker, and bakeware  * Appliances: washer, dryer, stove, oven, fridge-freezer, dishwasher, and microwaveOn extended stays, we also include housekeeping every two weeks! As a host, Lodgeur offers the quality and consistency of a boutique hotel:   Lodgeur is for travelers who want to stay in a beautiful property. A place that feels like a home-away-from-home. Whether it's for a few nights or a few hundred. Blending the style and standards of a boutique hotel with the spaciousness of an apartment.   Our guests want beautifully-designed homes. But without invasive and amateur hosts. The comfort and consistency of a hotel. But without the hassle of a check-in desk and drab decor. A space to work, cook, and relax. A pool and gym in each building. A 24/7 guest services team. A curated local guide.   We select properties in the best areas in each city. Close to your office, attractions, and places to eat and drink. Our interior designers craft the decor of each property one by one. The result is a place that feels like a home-away-from-home.Guest access24/7 self-check in. No need to arrange picking up and dropping off keys in person with us. Thanks to our smart technology, you’ll receive a code prior to your arrival to pick up your keys and parking pass (parking for one car is included).

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Recently built pet-friendly complex in the hub of downtown with fabulous amenities! - Large swimming pool w/poolside loungers & grills + a rooftop sky lounge sofas- Spacious gym onsite with high-quality equipment so you don’t miss a workout- Pet-friendly & 8 blocks to Discovery Green Urban park w/playground, events, dog run- All the most exciting attractions, museums & eats are within a 5 km or 3 mi radius - Wi-Fi, laptop-friendly workspaces, free garage parking, game room with pool tableThe spaceThis 2nd-floor 557 sq ft | 51 sqm studio apartment has been cheerfully decorated and includes resort-like amenities such as the large swimming pool with grills, a spacious gym with modern equipment, and a sky lounge roof terrace where you can relax with a beverage and city views. For the traveler that doesn’t leave home without their furry friend, this property is pet-friendly and is located 8 blocks from Discovery Green Urban park where there is a fun dog run for your companion. This unique studio that accommodates 4 guests features: - A luminous open-plan living area with a large sofa that can be pulled out to sleep two people if needed, a cushy armchair, a coffee table plus a flatscreen wall-mounted TV, and direct access to the balcony. A perfect place to relax and spend downtime moments at home. - A fully-equipped kitchen with all the appliances, utensils, and accessories you’d need to prepare meals at home.- A dining table to enjoy a meal at home.  - 1 plush queen bed that is separated by a half wall away from the kitchen area.- A full modern bathroom with a tub/shower combo.- A laptop-friendly work place set up with a desk, chair, and lamp to comfortably accommodate the remote worker.- A laundry room with a washing machine and dryer in the unit for added convenience.- There is an unassigned parking space in the garage free of charge. There is additional parking on the street if needed.

Furnished with new furniture, beautifully decorated, with high-speed Internet, 65’ LED smart TV with HBO. This spacious home has 4 bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a dedicated work-space office conveniently minutes away from Willowbrook, Aerodome, and 10 miles away from Bush Intercontinental Airport. name: Apartment in Houston
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Lodgeur2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This Lodgeur listing is a one-bedroom, one-bathroom 576 SF loft apartment on the sixth floor. It is located in Mid Main Lofts, a trendy 2016 apartment complex located in Houston's Midtown Cultural Arts and Entertainment District. In Houston's most walkable neighborhood, you’ll be close to theaters, galleries, shops, restaurants, bars, art, music, Whole Foods, and more. But you’ll also be in your own urban oasis overlooking a one-acre courtyard and pool. There’s a METRORail station right outside, and it’s 3-stops to the Houston Medical Center or Downtown (Transit Score of 75 and a Walk Score of 90).    You’ll forget that you’re in one of the largest cities in the US as you look out over the pool... These hip apartments feature polished concrete floors and urban loft-style steel ceilings. Our designers drew inspiration from Texas and the local music and art scene, and to create cool, modern, and stylish interiors.   Guests will have access to the following amenities:     * Secure resident parking is included at no charge    * A 24-hour fitness center with strength and cardio conditioning equipment, along with yoga and Crossfit studio    * Swimming pool with sun terrace and loungers    * One-acre recreational courtyard featuring grilling stations    * Multiple residents’ lounges, that include a large and cozy fireplace, pool table, classic arcade games, and TVs   Each Lodgeur listing includes:     * A self-check-in process to make social distancing easier    * A comfortable king-size bed, soft sheets, and cozy pillows for the perfect night's sleep    * Toiletries from MALIN+GOETZ, plush bath, and pool towels, a hairdryer and hair straightener / flat iron    * A well-lit desk and fast internet    * Smart TVs to watch local channels or to stream from your favorite provider    * Fully equipped kitchens: coffee maker, kettle, toaster, blender, cookware, and bakeware    * Appliances: washer, dryer, stove, oven, fridge-freezer, dishwasher, and microwave   As a host, Lodgeur offers the quality and consistency of a boutique hotel:   Lodgeur is for travelers who want to stay in a beautiful property. A place that feels like a home-away-from-home. Whether it's for a few nights or a few hundred. Blending the style and standards of a boutique hotel with the spaciousness of an apartment.   Our guests want beautifully designed homes. But without invasive and amateur hosts. The comfort and consistency of a hotel. But without the hassle of a check-in desk and drab decor. A space to work, cook, and relax. A pool and gym in each building. A curated local guide.   We select properties in the best areas in each city. Close to your office, attractions, and places to eat and drink. Our interior designers craft the decor of each property one by one. The result is a place that feels like a home-away-from-home.Guest access24/7 self-check in. No need to arrange picking up and dropping off keys in person with us. Thanks to our smart technology, you’ll receive a code prior to your arrival to pick up your keys and parking pass (parking for one car is included).

number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2020**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: 🔥LOCATION LOCATION!! Forget your worries in this peaceful and serene space. Enjoy your private balcony, covered and underground garage , pool, gym, media center, wine room and business lounge. Located in a GREAT area. 8 mins from The Galleria Mall, 1 minute away from Starbucks, Meyerland, and NRG stadium. 5-10 minutes away from all of Houston’s most popular restaurants, shopping centers, plazas, and tourist attractions. This is the perfect location  come & see what Houston has to offer!The spaceRelax at the modern and comfy 1 BR apt nestled in a luxurious apartment complex. Its prime Houston location lets you easily explore top restaurants, the Galleria mall, and attractions. The elegant design and a rich amenity list will satisfy your every need.✔ Comfortable King Bed✔Open Design Living✔ Smart TVs with Netflix, Hulu✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi✔ Access to Community Amenities (Gym, Business lounge, Wine room, Media center Pool + More)A blend of comfort, style, and convenience greets you as soon as you step inside this elegant apartment. While decorating this inviting retreat, we have worked hard to create a "2nd home" feeling for our guests. The living area is the apartment's heartbeat, successfully combining the lively living room with a sitting area and the fully equipped kitchen. The windows and balcony doors allow for plenty of natural light to illuminate the space throughout the day. Together with the bright wooden floors and tasteful décor, create a feeling of warmth and coziness. The comfortable bedroom is designed to offer all the rest you need after a long day of exploring Houston, Texas.★ LIVING ROOM ★Enjoy in this inviting and comfortable setting where you will have everything needed to relax in complete serenity.✔Comfortable Leather sofa✔ Smart TV with Netflix, & Hulu✔ Stylish Coffee Tables✔ Comfy Sofa Chair✔ Access to the Balcony★ KITCHEN & DINING ★Even the most demanding of chefs would enjoy preparing delicious meals using numerous state-of-the-art cooking appliances. In addition, spacious granite countertops and the vast kitchen island provide plenty of workspaces for you to prepare delicious homemade delicacies.✔ Microwave✔ Stove✔ Oven✔ Refrigerator/Freezer with Water Dispenser✔ Dishwasher✔ Coffee Maker with Complimentary Pods✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water✔ Glasses✔ Silverware✔ Pots & PansServe those delicious meals directly on the kitchen island. If you are looking for a more formal dining setting, the inviting table is next to the kitchen.✔ Kitchen Island with Seating for 2 ★ BEDROOM ★The tastefully furnished bedroom is designed to provide hotel-like comfort and convenience needed to relax and rest so you can remain energized and do everything you have planned the next day.✔ King-Size Bed with Pillows, Linens, and Sheets✔ Smart TV with Netflix, & Hulu✔ Walk-In Closet with Hangers and Shelves✔ Cabinet with Spacious Drawers✔ Night Stand with a Reading Light✔ Ensuite Bathroom with a Shower.★ BATHROOMS ★The apartment features an inviting full bathroom, accessible directly from the bedroom. The bathroom is stocked with all essential toiletries for your maximum convenience. ✔ Shower Cabin✔ Mirror✔ Toilet✔ Towels✔ Hair Dryer✔ Essential Toiletries★ BALCONY ★Step out to the private balcony to catch some fresh air, soak up the sun, and feel the pulse of the neighborhood.✔ Seating Area with Table and ChairsLook no further than our serene home for your memorable visit to Houston, Texas We are looking forward to you experiencing it in its complete comfort and coziness.Guest accessThe entire apartment is exclusively yours, without interruption for the duration of your stay, so relax, unwind, and make yourself at home.Other than the already mentioned amenities, the house also features:✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi✔ Air Conditioning✔ Heating✔ Washer+ Dryer✔ Iron The apartment is a part of the upscale luxury apartment complex, allowing our guests access to many state-of-the-art luxury facilities and amenities.✔ 24-Hour Fitness Club.✔ Bike Storage ✔ Clubroom with Billiards, TV's, Kitchen/✔ 2nd Floor Outdoor Lounge with Comfy Seating and Pool✔ Free ParkingOther things to note★ NO PETS ★Although we adore animals, our apartment is not equipped to accommodate your furry friends.★ NO PARTIES ALLOWED ★We kindly ask you to respect the apartment, neighbors, and house rules by not throwing any sorts of parties or large gatherings. Any loud noises outside acceptable hours will be reported, and you will be asked to vacate the premises. Thank you very much for your understanding.★ BACKGROUND CHECK REQUIRED ★To remain compliant with our apartment community and ensure the safety of all guests, a background check is required if the duration of your stay is 3 days.★ COVID-19 SANITIZATION ★Heath, safety, and wellbeing of our guests are of utmost importance to us. For this reason, we use a thorough process of cleaning after each check-out.

more description: This brand new 2022 luxury suite is just minutes away from Houston's most popular attractions, such as the Toyota Center and GRB Convention Centers, Minute Maid Park and more. This is a prime location in artsy East Downtown with fast access to Midtown, the Museum District, the Med Center, UofH and many spots in between! *Reservations for this room are available for females only. I have another room available that is open to both male and female guests. (Bookings must meet this criteria).The spaceBuilt in 2022, this brand new home offers high end upgrades and modern finishes, providing a truly luxury travel experience. In addition to large tiled tub shower, quartz countertops and lush carpeting, the room offers everything you need to feel at home, including a queen memory foam bed, feather and down fill comforters and pillows, upgraded finishes and cabinetry and a spacious closet. Perfect for 1-2 female guests, this petite 3rd-floor guest suite with private bath is ready to provide a phenomenal stay, starting with high-end bedding, a large functional writing desk, mini-fridge, microwave and 55" Samsung 4k Smart TV. Best of all, with access to the 4th-floor rooftop terrace, you'll have a front-row seat to rare and breathtaking views of the Houston skyline. Located on a quiet street in one of the hottest spots in Houston, you can enjoy the downtown views and city life while maintaining your peace and privacy within this gated address. Last but not least, free street parking is always available with easy, fast access to dozens of restaurants, coffee shops and venues nearby. You'll have no problem settling in! Convenient street parking is available right outside the gated entry of the home community. A special gate code and front door code will be provided to you upon booking for easy in and out access. ***This is 1 of 2 Airbnb rooms I host in the home. The rooms are on separate floors so crossing paths with other friendly travelers is unlikely The only time you may potentially cross paths with other guests is either entering or exiting the home.

more description: As a Fashion Designer who is interested in Interior Design, the journey becoming an Airbnb Super Host is like a dream come true to me! Each furniture is purposely hand-picked by me to serve as a designed home where you can enjoy the ideal stay either for work or travel! Cleanliness – Minimalist – Cozy are the sum of our home style. Nothing is greater than having a comfortable, relaxing and calming stay for the trip.Not forget to mention about the safe, quiet and respectful neighborhood.The spaceThe house is a 3B 2B concept. We have our own master bedroom and guest will have their own bedroom and a shared bathroom right next to it - super convenient!KITCHEN_ A kitchen marble island with 2 power outlets on both sides for devices charging convenience, with 4 high leather chairs_ Big microwave underneath for easier carry food in and out_ Touchless stainless-steel trash can_ Depth stainless-steel refrigerator with automatic fresh water refill inside (ice-cube is in the under drawer)_ Dish washer to place hand-washed utensils, cups_ We provide the following items to accommodate the max occupancy of the home: plates, bowls, silverware, drinking glasses, cooking utensils. We also provide salt, pepper, sugar, cling wrap and foil wrap. No other cooking essentials or supplies are provided (oil, sprays or other cooking ingredients, etc.)LIVING ROOM_ Mid-century styled Leather sectional sofa, a leather futon sofa bed and a designed chair_Coffee table/ Blankets/ Pillow throws_ A projector with 100” wall screen with custom-made black-out curtainBED ROOM_ Queen bed/ Pillows/ Blanket/ Bed sheets_ Desk/ Chair/ Mini trash can/ Laundry basket/ Hangers/ Mini shelfLAUNDRY ROOM (Access only for longer stays from 7days & up)_ Washer/ Dryer with provided laundry detergent, dryer sheet_ Iron/ Distill water/ Vacuum/ Swiffer WetSHARED BATHROOM_ Shampoo/ Conditioner/ Body wash/ Hand soap/ Toilet paper/ Q-tips/ Hair dryer_ Bath towels are provided accommodate the number of guests.ESTIMATED DISTANCES FROM THE HOME (vary from different time of the date)_ NRG Stadium: 11 min_ Midtown: 15 min_ Downtown: 25 min_ Texas Medical Center: 15 min_ Pearland Town Center: 12 min_ Hobby Airport: 22 min_ George Bush Intercontinental Airport: 40 min_ Galveston: 1 hour

number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 6 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✓ Sleeps 8 with Comfy King Bed + Queen bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Med Ctr West U Apt (910SQFT)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 5* SUPER host with 9000+ reviews✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 1GBPs fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.Houston – West University Place area modern theme Getaway with entire 900 square feet recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 Queen bed, 2 twin beds and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $30 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy West University Place/River Oak area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new Kroger Foods, HEB, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog , Present Company Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) –• El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!)• Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• Flagship Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• 2 Starbuck's• Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks TheaterUnder 8 minute Uber will you to –• Central Downtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer.We do charge $18 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.Please let us know 5 business days ahead if you would like pack and play

Outside lounge patio area with hammock, stainless steel appliances and fully equipped kitchen, hardwood floors, granite counter tops throughout, large walk-in closet, Fullsize Washer&Dryer. WiFi Color Printer. METRO Rt 44 bus stop at corner, bike trails nearby. 1 mile to Downtown, less than 4 miles from Museum District. Couples Bikes on-site.The spaceThis is a fully renovated 1 bedroom house (extremly clean) with a large patio and yard.  There is a very comfortable sleep number queen size bed and a full size sleeper sofa. Full size stainless steel appliances in the kitchen, including a Starbucks Coffee machine, full size tea kettle and electric wine opener.  The place has high ceilings, lots of natural light with beautiful artwork by a local artist.  This place is great for couples, business travelers and those with small pets.  The property is fully gated and includes a whole house security system. Parking is inside the  property (3/4vehicles). Double patio doors open directly to the deck with patio furniture and hammock. Ladies cruiser bike on-site to use on local bike paths, gym and bike to Target store.

description: Stylish EaDo 3Bd Home w/ Breathtaking Skyline View
name: Townhouse in Greater Fifth Ward
unit rental details: Entire townhouse hosted by The Nomadio8 guests ·  · 3 bedrooms ·  · 3 beds ·  · 3 baths
number of guests: 8 guests · **__** · 3 bedrooms · **__** · 3 beds · **__** · 3 baths**__**Joined in July 2022**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Revel in the stylish design of this spacious 3BR 3Bath oasis immersed in a tranquil, historic, and friendly Riverside neighborhood. It offers a relaxing getaway 5 minutes away from Downtown Houston, excellent restaurants, shops, attractions, and landmarks.Modern, fantastic comforts and a rich amenity list will leave you in awe.✔ 3 Comfortable Bedrooms✔ Open Design Living✔ Fully Equipped Kitchen✔ Cozy✔ Skyline View✔ Balcony✔ Smart TVs✔ High-Speed Wi-Fi✔ Free ParkingLearn more below!The spaceAs soon as you step foot in this beautiful home, you're welcomed by a very stylish yet highly comfortable open floor plan. Take a step back and enjoy the lovely 15-foot ceilings. It is designed and decorated in an elegant manner that complements the fantastic Houston location.The fully equipped kitchen and adjacent dining area are where you'll get to prepare and enjoy delicious meals with your loved ones before relaxing in the living room, setting the stage for memorable evenings. Plenty of natural light comes through the large windows, making the home very bright during the day, accenting the beautifully glossed hardwood floors, and enhancing the pleasant ambiance.Retreat to three comfortable bedrooms, which feature 5☆-resort comforts that allow you to rest after an exciting day of Houston adventures. The lavish master bedroom offers direct access to an ensuite bath and the sun-soaked balcony, a perfect place for an early morning yoga coffee or yoga session with the unreal view of the Houston skyline. The balcony offers a space where you can catch a breath of fresh air and relax. An ideal place to start your day.There are numerous options in this gorgeous home. We are looking forward to you experiencing them all.★ LIVING ROOMS ★It immediately feels like home! Find your place on the comfy sofa, cuddle up with a good book, watch a movie, or discuss your plans for the day.✔ Comfortable Sofas with Pillows✔ Smart TV✔ Stylish Decor✔ Comfy Sofa Chair✔ Stylish Coffee Table★ KITCHEN & DINING ★ It is fully equipped with state-of-the-art cooking appliances that make it suitable for preparing any meal, whether a simple breakfast, quick snack, or a three-course gourmet dinner. Spacious granite countertops and a central kitchen island provide plenty of room to work your MasterChef magic.✔ Microwave✔ Stove✔ Oven✔ Toaster✔ Coffee Maker✔ Hot Water Kettle✔ Refrigerator/Freezer✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water✔ Trays✔ Glasses✔ Silverware✔ Pots & Pans✔ Garbage DisposalHave a few drinks on the balcony while the food is getting ready. Once it's done, serve it on the dining table and enjoy a tasty meal with your loved ones. Breakfasts, snacks, and smaller meals can easily be served on the inviting kitchen island.✔ Dining Table with Seating for 6✔ Kitchen Island with Seating for 2★ SLEEPING ARRANGEMENTS – 3 BEDROOMS ★ After an exciting day of sightseeing, you will be looking to rest for an equally entertaining tomorrow. Once you are ready to relax, please make your way to these comfortable bedrooms.♛ Master Bedroom: King-Size Bed, Smart TV, Ensuite Bathroom, Access to the Balcony♛ Bedroom 2: Queen-Size Bed, Smart TV, Desk for Work♛ Bedroom 3: Queen-Size Bed, Modern Artwork, Ensuite BathroomAll bedrooms are equipped with a similar set of amenities.✔ Premium Pillows, Linens, and Sheets✔ Closets with Hangers and Shelves (Walk-In in Master)✔ Dressers with Spacious Drawers✔ Nightstands with Reading Lamps★ BATHROOMS ★Besides the ensuite bathroom of the master bedroom, the house features two full relaxing bathrooms catering to the remaining bedrooms. All are stocked with fresh towels and essential toiletries to ensure you have a carefree stay.✔ Walk-In Shower✔ Bathtub with a Shower✔ Vanity (Double in the Master Bathroom)✔ Mirror✔ Toilet✔ Towels✔ Hair Dryer✔ Essential Toiletries★ OFFICE ★The need to work from home has never been greater. That is why we furnished a private space where you can easily set up and attend to business.✔ Workspace (Desk + Chair)✔ Work Lamp✔ High Speed Wifi★ BALCONY ★ (E)A fantastic home like this would not shine in its best light if it did not have a private area where you can relax and enjoy the mesmerizing natural surroundings. Step out into the fully fenced balcony, offering a tranquil oasis perfect for relaxation and small outdoor activities.✔ Seating Area with Table and Chairs✔ Breathtaking Skyline ViewWe look forward to you finding your happiness in this charming house. This could mean unplugging for a while, watching a movie, curling up on the sofa with a good book, or enjoying a glass of wine on the balcony.Let us know if you have any questions; we're locals; we have the answers. Happy Travels!

description: Med Center | King Bed | Coffee + WiFi | FREE PARK
name: Apartment in Neartown - Montrose
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Sarah5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in February 2018**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✓ King bed + extra beds in an interior designed specifically for modern Quirky, chic apartment (720 SQFT)✓ Hand made quartz countertop in the kitchen with grey subway modern backsplash ✓ 5* SUPER host with 8000+ reviews✓ 55" 4K ESPN (through Hulu app), Amazon, Netflix, HBO ✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, W/D, outdoor Grill✓ 500Mbps WiFi✓  5 miles Radius:  Toyota Center (Rockets) / George R Brown Convention Center / Discovery Green & Medical District, Houston zooThe spaceHouston – Lower Montrose/Heights area modern theme Getaway with entire 1000 square feet recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.One  bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 sofa bed & 1 double bed and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→  We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $20 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy Lower Montrose/River Oaks/Heights area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new Kroger Foods, HEB, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog (3 mins walk), Present Company (Bar 3 mins walk), Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) – • El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!) • Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• Flagship Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• 2 Starbuck's • Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks TheaterUnder 8 minute Uber will you to – • Central Downtown • Museum District • U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 89, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer. We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.→ Montrose was named one of the "ten great neighborhoods in America" for its demographic diversity, renovated mansions, bungalows with wide porches, and cottages located along tree-lined boulevards.

description: Lodgeur | Picture-perfect studio loft | Midtown
name: Apartment in Midtown
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Lodgeur2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2014**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: This brand new Lodgeur listing (January 2022) is a spacious 512 SF studio loft apartment on the fourth floor, featuring polished concrete floors and urban loft-style steel ceilings. It is located in Mid Main Lofts, a trendy 2016 apartment complex located in Houston's Midtown Cultural Arts and Entertainment District.In Houston's most walkable neighborhood, you’ll be close to theaters, galleries, shops, restaurants, bars, art, music, Whole Foods, and more. But you’ll also be in your own urban oasis overlooking a one-acre courtyard and pool. There’s a METRORail station right outside, and it’s 3-stops to the Houston Medical Center or Downtown (Transit Score of 75 and a Walk Score of 90).  Guests will have access to the following amenities:     * Secure resident parking is included at no charge  * A 24-hour fitness center with strength and cardio conditioning equipment, along with yoga and Crossfit studio  * Swimming pool with sun terrace and loungers  * One-acre recreational courtyard featuring grilling stations  * Multiple residents’ lounges, that include a large and cozy fireplace, pool table, classic arcade games, and TVs Each Lodgeur listing is fully equipped for both short and extended stays:     * A self-check-in process to make social distancing easier    * A comfortable king-size bed, soft sheets, and a selection of pillows for the perfect night's sleep  * Toiletries from MALIN+GOETZ, plush bath, and pool towels, a hairdryer and hair straightener / flat iron  * A well-lit desk and fast internet, a Bluetooth speaker  * Smart TVs to watch local channels or to stream from your favorite provider  * Fully equipped kitchens: coffee maker, kettle, toaster, blender, tri-ply cookware, rice cooker, Crock-Pot slow cooker, and bakeware  * Appliances: washer, dryer, stove, oven, fridge-freezer, dishwasher, and microwaveOn extended stays, we also include housekeeping every two weeks! As a host, Lodgeur offers the quality and consistency of a boutique hotel:   Lodgeur is for travelers who want to stay in a beautiful property. A place that feels like a home-away-from-home. Whether it's for a few nights or a few hundred. Blending the style and standards of a boutique hotel with the spaciousness of an apartment.   Our guests want beautifully-designed homes. But without invasive and amateur hosts. The comfort and consistency of a hotel. But without the hassle of a check-in desk and drab decor. A space to work, cook, and relax. A pool and gym in each building. A 24/7 guest services team. A curated local guide.   We select properties in the best areas in each city. Close to your office, attractions, and places to eat and drink. Our interior designers craft the decor of each property one by one. The result is a place that feels like a home-away-from-home.Guest access24/7 self-check in. No need to arrange picking up and dropping off keys in person with us. Thanks to our smart technology, you’ll receive a code prior to your arrival to pick up your keys and parking pass (parking for one car is included).

more description: Make this newly renovated 1 bedroom/1 bath American Craftsman Guesthouse, your home for your next visit to Houston! We have enough room to accommodate 2 guests comfortably. The house features luxury finishes and is centrally located, just minutes from Museum District, Downtown Houston, parks, zoo, medical center and walking distance to University of Houston. Full kitchen and baths with household amenities included, ready to live in for long or short term stays.The spaceThis is a tiny home guest house built behind the garage on a property that has 2 airbnb properties. The backyard is shared between 2 homes. The main house is in the front of the lot and faces the street. This unit is in the rear of the lot and faces the back yard and parking area. The kitchen is fully stocked with pots, pans and cooking supplies, the bathrooms have fresh towels, and the bedrooms have fresh linens for you! Also, you will have a ROKU stick with access to NetFlix, Pandora, SLING TV and other streaming channels.

more description: Welcome to our Comfy Studio in Houston, TX. The space features many amenities to make you feel right at home in 200 sq/ft plus a loft space. A truly unique stay that will leave you wanting to stay longer. Our property is always sparkling clean has a full kitchen and bathroom along with a TV and wifi. 1 bed is on the loft and is a queen sized bed that is soft and comfortable. The couch is a twin bed and the another twin bed pulls out from under the couch. Great for couples or groups.The spaceHey welcome to our unique space stocked with everything you need to make you feel at home away from home. 1 Queen bed on the loft (requires climbing) and 2 twin beds that are part of the couch. Comfortably sleeps 3. Sleeping 4 guest requires the pull out mattress be used to fit comfortably. Ac/Heater mini split unit is awesome. Roku TV with Netflix, Hulu, YouTube TV. Wifi available! Kitchen with cooking supplies. Full bathroom. Parking space is available with a private entrance into  the backyard where the Guest House is. Shared backyard with host!

more description: A bedroom in a beautiful  3 bedroom house recently renovated located in the Northern part of Houston. In quiet residential area & only 30 mins drive to Houston Downtown. A truly comfortable house to experience life in Spring Texas; a suburb of the Texas biggest city.The spaceWe take our guests' safety serious! We’re doing whatever we can to make sure that the whole house and the rooms in particular are sanitized and clean on regular basis.Sprays of ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL 99% is provided to allow continuous disinfestation of the place for our family and guests. We encourage guests to use the sprays as needed for everyone's safety (see materials as shown in the picture). The building is a single story 3-bed room house and can accommodate 7 to 10 comfortably. Each bedroom is booked separately, but I am willing to offer extra-discount to anyone interested in more than one room at the time.It has recently been carefully modernized; furnished with a huge full set of couches, 2 bar chairs at bar and dining table with 6 chairs in the dining-room, as well as an office desk at guests are welcome to use.2 car garage and other 3 could be parked safely in the driveway.

more description: Enjoy your stay at our bright one bedroom suite. Our home is located in the heart of downtown. This spacious home is perfect for a group of traveling friends or a family looking for a peaceful stay. There is plenty to do within walking distance including bars and restaurants or relax at home and watch Netflix or Hulu on the Smart TV.The spaceSteps away from Toyota Center and a slew of community hotspots, this stay is perfect for guests and small groups wanting to enjoy the comforts of home in a quiet residential neighborhood within walking distance to downtown. Your comfort is our priority. We provide the following great amenities:✅ Master bedroom with queen bed and walk in closet.✅ Our cleaning staff is professionally trained and follow a tightly regimented cleaning and sanitizing checklist.✅ Wireless high-speed internet is always available.✅ Ultra HD Smart TV's with streaming options. ✅ Kitchen appliances equipped with fridge, stovetop, microwave, coffeemaker, blender, air fryer and toaster.✅ Guests have access to our in-unit washer and dryer.✅ Resort style pool.✅ Private balcony access. ✅ Rooftop lounge access.✅ Keyless entry.✅ Central AC and Heat✅ 24/7 Fitness Center ✅ Business Lounge with Wifi access✅ Entertainment room with Pool Table, Games, TV's and more.✅ Access to entire place and common areas. IN TOWN FOR PLEASURE :Apartment is located downtown houston which a short drive from Houstons nightlife. I.E. Galleria, Midtown, The Heights, Montrose, Downtown and EADO. Enjoy Herman Park, the aquarium and much more. BUSINESS:Nice, quiet and comfortable place with a patio. We are also minutes away from business hubs and local coffee shops.

more description: ✓ Comfy King Bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Med Center Apartment (700 sq ft)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 500MBPS fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Secured Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 sofa bed & 1 double bed and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $20 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Under 10 minute Uber will you to –• Central Downtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.

more description: We are pleased to offer our modern 1 BR/1BA apartment in Midtown Houston w FREE GARAGE PARKING! Located minutes from Downtown, Minute Maid Park, Toyota Center, George R. Brown Convention Center and a quick ride over to all the hip Montrose area bars and restaurants! Enjoy access to our salt water pool , work out facilities. Perfect place to enjoy a quiet stay, yet easily reach all areas including Galleria and Med Center. Washer/dryer, Wifi, and all amenities provided! Near it all!The spaceHere for fun?You're a short drive or Uber ride from Houston nightlife in Midtown, Downtown, The Heights, Montrose and Eado!Here for work?Enjoy a private and quiet, comfortable place with a peaceful patio by the pool with different work spaces on each floor as well!Here for an extended stay?Enjoy all the comforts of home and a hotel all in one! Full kitchen with amenities, washer and dryer, and a Jacuzzi tub. Easily walk able to drug stores, banks, lunch spots, bars and restaurants!

name: Apartment in Houston

number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: ✓ Comfy King Bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Med Center Apartment (700 sq ft)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 500MBPS fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Secured Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 sofa bed & 1 double bed and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $20 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Under 10 minute Uber will you to –• Central Downtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.

more description: ✓ Sleeps 2 on comfy KING sized bed in an interior designed modern quirky, chic Montrose Apartment (500 SQFT) ✓ Walk Score 88 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ 5* SUPER host with 12000+ reviews✓ Huge modern and luxurious bathroom ✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG/Discovery Green, Med Center, Zoo✓ FREE Parking✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 55” 4K TV w/ Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, HBO, ESPN✓ 1GBPs fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new stainless steel appliancesThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.Houston – Montrose area modern theme Getaway studio unit (500 sqft), recently completely renovated. No matter why you’re traveling to Houston, this is the perfect home base to explore and experience Space City. Its central location coupled with high-end amenities make this home the perfect choice for convenience and ease of living.Sleeps 2 on very comfortable KING sized bed. Open living and kitchen, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, tile floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $30 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Located in the trendy Montrose/West University Place/River Oaks area means easy walking access to some of Houston’s iconic restaurants, shops, Buffalo Bayou, museums, and entertainment venues.Within 2-block is a brand new HEB, Trader Joes, West Alabama Ice House, Menil Collection, Rothko Chapel, Common Bond Café, Starbucks, Pit Room (Houston’s famous BBQ), CVS, Light Year (Wine bar) and Good Dog , and Present Company. Within a few minutes walk (Under 1.5 mile radius) –• El Tiempo Cantina (best fajitas & margaritas in Texas!)• Yoga Central• Mandell Park (recent $5 million renovation for pets and bike more!)• Waugh Drive Bat Colony (250k Mexican bats take flight every evening)• Pizaro’s Pizza Napoletana• River Oaks Shopping Center• H-E-B, Trader Joes, Kroger• Post office• Common Bond (Breakfast for couples)• Breakfast Klub (Must visit Breakfast of Houston)• Starbucks• Torchy’s Taco Shop (some of Texas' best tacos)• Montrose pubs crawl• Macaroon by Patisse• Marble Slab Creamery• Menchies Frozen Yogurt• Nail Time• River Oaks Theater<8 minute Uber ride will take you to –• Downtown• Midtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooLocated right next to the highway allows you to easily travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Katy, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc. So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Plenty of FREE street parking is available. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in Houston.We have one camera on our front porch. It is there simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.With a WalkScore of 88, this Montrose/Neartown home has quick access to the best of restaurants, shops, museums, and bars that Houston has to offer.We do charge $18 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. more description: The Nostalgic Neon is a 1 bedroom/bathroom apartment located in West Houston near Spring Valley right off of I-10. This cozy unit is the perfect space for all travelers offering the ideal getaway in a lovely quaint neighborhood just a few minutes from Downtown Houston nightlife. There are also malls within 15 minutes of the unit. If you enjoy luxury, comfort, and stylish space, The Nostalgic Neon Room has space available for booking. Our team would love to host you. name: Apartment in Midtown
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Cynthia2 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 1 bed ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Come find yourself in a quaint studio apartment for a long or short term stay. The perfect space for 1-2 people. The studio apartment is not remodeled, but kept in a timeless condition and in a great location. Right next to the fun and bustling Houston life experience. Driving, walking and biking distance from great restaurants, bars and sightseeing.The spaceHot Zip Code!* Perfect LOCATION! - Close to the Metro Train, bars, restaurants, attractions. Including Jones Hall, Wortham Center, Minute Maid Park (Astros), Toyota Center (Rockets) / George R Brown Convention Center / Discovery Green & Medical District, Aquarium, Houston Zoo, Tunnel system, Museum District, The Alley Theater downtown and the PGA Memorial Park Golf Course.* Near the Medical center in a short 5 – 10 min driving distance to MD Anderson, Memorial, Methodist, Texas Children’s, Children’s Memorial Hermann, HCA Houston, Ben Taub, St. Joseph’s and Shriners Hospital for Children* Located right in the heart of Houston just minutes from Downtown, Galleria, River Oaks, The Heights and Montrose District* Fast Wi-Fi with 1 large Smart TV for entertainment* The apartment has not been remodeled and still in its vintage form * Moderate Kitchen for those who do not want to eat out* FREE parking with a car tag that is provided.* Pet fee is $35 per stay for the 1st pet, then $20 per for each additional pet. Deposit required.* Absolutely no smoking in the apartment. A $175 fee will be applied.Please be mindful of the Urban Houston population in the Downtown and Montrose District. There is a population of drifters that may approach for food or money. Houston being one of the most diverse cities  in the nation.  You have a comfortable Queen size bed - Sleeps 2There is a chair you can sit and relax with extra stoolsSmall dining table for 2.You have your own bathroom Double Hot Plate Electric Counter top  BurnerMicrowaveCrock PotWaffle MakerCoffee makerSmall refrigerator supplied water and Ice

more description: All Frontdesk stays are contactless self-check-in and include Scout, our exclusive digital companion to guide you through everything you'll need before and during your time with us. We're also available 24/7 via text or phone and have a local team should you need anything.The spaceOur one-bedroom apartment is furnished with a queen bed and everything you & your guests need to enjoy your stay in Houston! In the kitchen, you'll find beautiful appliances, a Keurig coffee maker, and basic cookware to cook simple meals for a cozy night in! There's free WiFi! Our studio and 1 bedroom stays come standard with 3 towels and washcloths and our 2 bedroom stays come with 4 each.Anything in the apartment is yours to use. Make yourself at home once you arrive. We do not provide any tv cable or streaming services. However, we do offer Roku TV's with apps like Netflix, Prime, Hulu, and more! Feel free to log into the apps with your own log in and enjoy!

description: 2 BEDS | 1 BATH - Fall-Inn Horizons Texas Paradise
name: Apartment in Houston
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Xavien6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: You'll be impressed by the high standard of comfort in this cozy suite. Its central location in Houston makes it an excellent choice for a relaxing getaway. We think it's the best place to stay if you want to see and do everything the area has to offer in style and convenience. The time has come for you to be moved to action! You're in close proximity to some amazing places. Finally, a surefire way to unwind and have fun. Throughout the entire day.The spaceWhat is it about this suite that appeals to us so much? It has a straightforward design that allows for a maximum of six occupants. The walk-in closet has two air mattresses available for you to use if you find that you require them.You will immediately feel as comfortable as a cloud thanks to our sofa chair and futon that are designed in a vintage manner. We wanted our guests to feel like they were in a living room with family or friends, so we equipped the living room with standing food trays and a GIANT 55-inch Smart TV. Here, you can watch the latest shows, movies, and news, and you can even go on YouTube to learn new tik toks.We want our guests' most productive days to start with drinks made in our coffee maker or blender. We also keep silverware, pots, pans, plates, mugs, bowls, and cooking tools so that we can make the best home-cooked meals. What's the point of a nice suite if it doesn't have a great kitchen that's fully stocked?We want our guests to be able to get simple items without having to go far, so we decided to invest in a personal washer and dryer and provide expert maintenance support for it. This will ensure that your clothing are always clean and ready to be worn.It is much simpler to maintain the temperature exactly where you want it when you have a heating and cooling system that is centrally located.You can use our Keratin body wash and conditioner at any time of the day to calm and refresh your skin. Our luxury white towels wrap around your body, and our hand-made bathroom rug catches your feet before they hit the cold floor. Our full bathroom is equipped with toilet paper, eco-friendly hand soap, a classic vanity mirror, and a high-pressure shower head that can be removed.After a stressful day at work, you may unwind on our private patio during the day and turn on our highlighted flame light in the evening to transform the space into a more intimate setting that is ideal for romance or unwinding.You can keep your mind and body sharp by going to our gym, which is next to the pool area. Full of cardio and weight-lifting machines, so you can get in a solid exercise without being trapped in traffic or taking too much time away from your schedule. Your body is the most important site of worship?OTHER FEATURES• A separate, private location in your home that is equipped with both a computer and Wi-Fi and serves as a dedicated workspace for when you are working from home.• A high-definition television with a screen measuring 55 inches that comes equipped with Disney+, HBO Max, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Hulu, and Roku so that you can watch all of your favorite shows.• Outdoor dining areaOn-site parking is provided at no cost to guests.• The structure is equipped with surveillance cameras.• Detectors for both smoke and fire; alarms• The washing and dryer are located inside, and they also have a terrace outside where they are located.• Free use of fitness equipment such as treadmills, weights, stationary cycles, and more

name: Apartment in Houston
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Prince5 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy this comforting 1bed 1 bath apartment in our lovely gated community with our gorgeous pool! Features a kingsize bed, granite countertop, stainless steel appliances! Located near Houston Medical Center, a few miles away from the Houston Galleria, Medical Center, Houston Zoo, Memorial Park & the Fine Arts District. Also, only a few miles away from various bars, restaurants & the best clubs. The apartment is located right off of I-610, close to I-59 & I-45 which leads directly downtown!The space*All surfaces are disinfected thoroughly, and hand sanitizer are located inside the apartment*Come & enjoy this beautiful home/community that features  5-star amenities such as inside the home as well as outside with the community!To start we have a lovely community here that features a 24/7 gym, directly behind that is our gorgeous pool with lounging chairs gas grills and extra tables & seating! Its hot & we know you'd love to come take a swim & enjoy!The Bedroom is fully equipped with a 32" Smart TV fully equipped with Wi-Fi and Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, Apple TV, and Hulu, a King size mattress with a cloud like feel mattress topper, elegant duvet comforters and sheets, body mirror, with a ceiling fan and gorgeous was decor!The Bathroom has features such as are  lovely garden tub with plenty of towels (face, body & make-up towels), cotton swabs, Ginger Lily 100% Vegan Shampoo, Conditioner & Body Wash, and a blow dryer provided as well as a small makeup mirror and first aid kit! The Living Room has standard AC/Heating, 55” Smart TV fully equipped with Wi-Fi and Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, Apple TV, and Hulu great for movie night with your significant other or with the family/friends. We also leave family fun games such as chess, Uno and cards, a sofa with a Queen sized pull-out bed, and access to the balcony with a beautiful view!In the Kitchen features for you a Keurig coffee maker with K-cups and creamer provided, a microwave, an enormous Samsung refrigerator, great function dishwasher with multiple settings, household cleaners, oven and electric stove top, all the cooking utensils + pots/pans set, plates/cups/mugs/wine glasses you need, and plenty of cabinet space!Other Amenities included inside of the home are a full sized washer/dryer, an iron and ironing board, gated accessible free parking, 24hr gym equipped with free-weights and cardio machines, and a pool open from 10AM-10PM with BBQ pits, an outdoor lounge area, cabana’s and pool-side chairs! Great area to just kick back relax and enjoy friends and family!We also want to include that this is Texas  & as beautiful as the home & the property is, when it gets hot, insects do tend to come out. The home/community is properly sprayed by pest control but we cannot control mother nature if you do see any bugs such as ants or roaches, it is normal. Whether it’s a stress-free weekend you’re looking for or a long-term stay you need to call home, our charming apartment and community provides all – while also the convenience of being right in the mix of all Houston has to offer, checkout some of our reviews and book now for your best Airbnb experience!Whether it’s a stress-free weekend you’re looking for or a long-term stay you need to call home, our charming apartment and community provides all – while also the convenience of being right in the mix of all Houston has to offer, checkout some of our reviews and book now for your best Airbnb experience!

more description: Property is a 100% fully rehabbed 1940 colonial style homestead. We made every effort to keep or reuse all the materials we could, to minimize the waste that ends up in the landfill. We used modern construction materials and techniques to make these units super efficient with the least long-term carbon footprint.There is a Kitchen microwave & mini fridge. NO STOVEExtra mattress is only available for bookings of 3+ guests. Please msg me to request it so we can get it ready for your stay.The spaceBIKES!!! There are two B-Cycle bike rental spots close by. Grab tacos, local shaved ice or one of the breweries, checkout UofH campus or the new EADO area. GOLF CART!!! Private tours of the neighborhood sights, breweries, local restaurants & bar drop offs available. Message for inquiries. There is also a great common area outside that everyone is welcome to use.

description: Lovely King Bed|Longterm stays|MedCenter&Downtown!
name: Apartment in Houston
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Prince4 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2017**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Enjoy this comforting 1bed 1 bath apartment in our lovely gated community with our gorgeous pool! Features a kingsize bed, granite countertop, stainless steel appliances! Located near Houston Medical Center, a few miles away from the Houston Galleria, Medical Center, Houston Zoo, Memorial Park & the Fine Arts District. Also, only a few miles away from various bars, restaurants & the best clubs. The apartment is located right off of I-610, close to I-59 & I-45 which leads directly downtown!The space*All surfaces are disinfected thoroughly, and hand sanitizer are located inside the apartment*Come & enjoy this beautiful home/community that features  5-star amenities such as inside the home as well as outside with the community!To start we have a lovely community here that features a 24/7 gym, directly behind that is our gorgeous pool with lounging chairs gas grills and extra tables & seating! Its hot & we know you'd love to come take a swim & enjoy!The Bedroom is fully equipped with a 32" Smart TV fully equipped with Wi-Fi and Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, Apple TV, and Hulu, a King size mattress with a cloud like feel mattress topper, elegant duvet comforters and sheets, body mirror, with a ceiling fan and gorgeous was decor!The Bathroom has features such as are  lovely garden tub with plenty of towels (face, body & make-up towels), cotton swabs, Ginger Lily 100% Vegan Shampoo, Conditioner & Body Wash, and a blow dryer provided as well as a small makeup mirror and first aid kit! The Living Room has standard AC/Heating, 55” Smart TV fully equipped with Wi-Fi and Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+, Apple TV, and Hulu great for movie night with your significant other or with the family/friends. We also leave family fun games such as chess, Uno and cards, a sofa with a Queen sized pull-out bed, and access to the balcony with a beautiful view!In the Kitchen features for you a Keurig coffee maker with K-cups and creamer provided, a microwave, an enormous Samsung refrigerator, great function dishwasher with multiple settings, household cleaners, oven and electric stove top, all the cooking utensils + pots/pans set, plates/cups/mugs/wine glasses you need, and plenty of cabinet space!Other Amenities included inside of the home are a full sized washer/dryer, an iron and ironing board, gated accessible free parking, 24hr gym equipped with free-weights and cardio machines, and a pool open from 10AM-10PM with BBQ pits, an outdoor lounge area, cabana’s and pool-side chairs! Great area to just kick back relax and enjoy friends and family!We also want to include that this is Texas  & as beautiful as the home & the property is, when it gets hot, insects do tend to come out. The home/community is properly sprayed by pest control but we cannot control mother nature if you do see any bugs such as ants or roaches, it is normal. Whether it’s a stress-free weekend you’re looking for or a long-term stay you need to call home, our charming apartment and community provides all – while also the convenience of being right in the mix of all Houston has to offer, checkout some of our reviews and book now for your best Airbnb experience!Whether it’s a stress-free weekend you’re looking for or a long-term stay you need to call home, our charming apartment and community provides all – while also the convenience of being right in the mix of all Houston has to offer, checkout some of our reviews and book now for your best Airbnb experience!

Close proximity to Route 59 make it a breeze to access all that Houston has to offer.The spaceThe house includes a stylish living room with large tv w/streaming apps, dining room, kitchen with all of the standard appliances, fast fiber wifi, and laundry in the garage. The bedroom includes a comfortable bed, small desk for catching up on emails, and plenty of closet space.Additionally, there is a large fenced in backyard with outdoor living and dining space and a grill and fire pit. There is also a rowing machine available for use. Parking is provided in the driveway or on the street.

number of guests: 5 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 1 bed · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in March 2021**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: Step into the comfort of this cozy 1BR apartment with outstanding facilities in the quiet and peaceful neighborhood in the center of The Medical Center. The apt promises a relaxing retreat close to the Museum District, best restaurants, stores, and entertainment, situated in the modern residential area. Authentic Houston living at its best!- Comfortable King Bed- Fully Equipped Kitchen-Free Parking-High-Speed Wifi- Keurig-Smart TVs-Gym  -Pool -Blender  -Toaster  See more below!The spaceAs you enter the cozy king bedroom apartment, you're welcomed by a stylish yet comfortable open-plan living area, designed and decorated in a contemporary fashion to complement the abundance of natural light coming through the large windows. The fully equipped kitchen connects through the dining room onto the entertaining living room, setting the tone for many memorable evenings. But the best is yet to come – retreat to the comfortable bedroom to rest and recharge after a lovely day in Houston!★ LIVING ROOM ★It immediately feels like home, with a snug sectional, coffee table for drinks and snacks, and a smart 55” TV for movie nights.✔ Comfortable Sectional with Pillows✔ 55" SmartTV - Netflix, HBO Max, and other streaming services included✔ Coffee Table✔ Reading Lamps★ KITCHEN & DINING ★Make delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen with several cooking amenities. Prepare any dish imaginable if you choose to stay in and enjoy the homey ambiance.✔ Microwave✔ Stove✔ Oven✔ Refrigerator/Freezer✔ Keurig- Coffee Maker✔ Toaster✔ Kettle✔ Sink - Hot & Cold Water✔ Glasses✔ Silverware✔ Dish-ware✔ Pots & Pans✔ Wine Glasses★ BEDROOMS ★Retreat to the tastefully furnished bedroom completely separated from the living area for ultimate privacy and relaxation.✔ Luxury Memory Foam King–Size Bed with Pillows, Linens, and Sheets✔ Night Stands with Reading Lamps✔ Wardrobe with Hangers and Shelves✔ Walk-in Closet ✔ Twin Size Air Mattress with King Pillows✔ Smart TV★ BATHROOM ★The apartment features a spacious full bathroom stocked with all necessities and essential toiletries, so you don't have to worry about packing your own.✔ Bath with a Shower ✔ Wash Basin✔ Mirror✔ Toilet✔ Towels✔ Essential Toiletries

more description: As a Fashion Designer who is interested in Interior Design, the journey becoming an Airbnb Super Host is like a dream come true to me! Each furniture is purposely hand-picked by me to serve as a designed home where you can enjoy the ideal stay either for work or travel! Cleanliness – Minimalist – Cozy are the sum of our home style. Nothing is greater than having a comfortable, relaxing and calming stay for the trip.Not forget to mention about the safe, quiet and respectful neighborhood.The spaceThe house is a 3B 2B concept. We have our own master bedroom and guest will have their own bedroom and a shared bathroom right next to it - super convenient!KITCHEN_ A kitchen marble island with 2 power outlets on both sides for devices charging convenience, with 4 high leather chairs_ Big microwave underneath for easier carry food in and out_ Touchless stainless-steel trash can_ Depth stainless-steel refrigerator with automatic fresh water refill inside (ice-cube is in the under drawer)_ Dish washer to place hand-washed utensils, cups_ We provide the following items to accommodate the max occupancy of the home: plates, bowls, silverware, drinking glasses, cooking utensils. We also provide salt, pepper, sugar, cling wrap and foil wrap. No other cooking essentials or supplies are provided (oil, sprays or other cooking ingredients, etc.)LIVING ROOM_ Mid-century styled Leather sectional sofa, a leather futon sofa bed and a designed chair_Coffee table/ Blankets/ Pillow throws_ A projector with 100” wall screen with custom-made black-out curtainBED ROOM_ Queen bed/ Pillows/ Blanket/ Bed sheets_ Desk/ Chair/ Mini trash can/ Laundry basket/ Hangers/ Mini shelfLAUNDRY ROOM (Access only for longer stays from 7days & up)_ Washer/ Dryer with provided laundry detergent, dryer sheet_ Iron/ Distill water/ Vacuum/ Swiffer WetSHARED BATHROOM_ Shampoo/ Conditioner/ Body wash/ Hand soap/ Toilet paper/ Q-tips/ Hair dryer_ Bath towels are provided accommodate the number of guests.ESTIMATED DISTANCES FROM THE HOME (vary from different time of the date)_ NRG Stadium: 11 min_ Midtown: 15 min_ Downtown: 25 min_ Texas Medical Center: 15 min_ Pearland Town Center: 12 min_ Hobby Airport: 22 min_ George Bush Intercontinental Airport: 40 min_ Galveston: 1 hour

more description: ✓ Comfy King Bed in an interior designed theme modern quirky, chic Med Center Apartment (700 sq ft)✓ Walk Score 89 (most errands accomplished on foot)✓ Hand made quartz countertop kitchen with modern backsplash✓ 55” 4k ESPN, HBO, Amazon, Netflix, Hulu✓ 500MBPS fiber secured WiFi✓ Brand new fridge, oven, D/W, microwave, outdoor grill✓ Secured Reserved Parking Spot✓ 5 miles Radius: Rockets, Astros, NRG Stadium/Discovery Green, Med Center, ZooThe space→ Our place is pet friendly and we welcome all fluffy guests. There is a $30 per pet fee to cover additional cleaning.One bedroom with 1 King sized bed, 1 sofa bed & 1 double bed and spacious living and dining room, hand-crafted Quartz countertops, vinyl floors, stylish furnishings with all modern convenience. Additionally have double roll away bed upon request.→ We welcome and love hosting fluffy guests. We do have $20 per fluffy guest per stay from our cleaners.Under 10 minute Uber will you to –• Central Downtown• Museum District• U of H Stadium• Menil Museum• NRG Stadium (Texans)• Medical District• Minute Maid Park (Astros)• Toyota Center (Rockets)• Rice Village• City Center• The Galleria• MD Anderson• Houston ZooAnd easy highway access allows you to travel anywhere in the Houston area: The Woodlands, Sugarland, Baytown, Conroe, Galveston, etc.So whether you’re relocating and need a temporary home or coming to play and need a place to stay Heart of Houston, this home is geared up to make your Houston visit easy, comfortable, and enjoyable. Come stay with us.Please get permission for the grill. Don’t mind you using it, just need to be aware that you understand the risks, and are grill smart. Provide your own briquettes.One reserved spot for parking is available in our apartment complex. We live in same complex and will help you with your needs, and any tips you might need for a great time in H-town.We have one camera on our front porch. It is simply to protect package deliveries, and prevent any bad activity. There are no cameras located within the unit.We do charge $12 per day for every extra guest over 2, which includes infants. If your total is over 2 individuals and an infant is included, you will be billed for the infant after your stay by AirBnB. Our efforts have included but are not limited to a working smoke and CO detector.

more description: The studio treehouse in the center of Montrose, the epicenter of walkable entertainment for Houston. You can enjoy strolling to countless restaurants, bars, museums.  There is street  parking.  The garage apartment is very efficient, is perfect for 1 - 2 people.  Two block walk to the bus line to get to medical center (2 miles) downtown(2.8 miles) or the galleria (4 miles).The spaceYou have 550 sq feet, there are black out curtains, so you can decide when the day begins! There is a compact fridge, microwave, garbage disposal, shower and induction burner. Washer and dryer facilities are offered 4 doors down (we have another Airbnb there)

description: 2 BEDS | 1 BATH - Fall-Inn Horizons Texas Paradise
name: Apartment in Houston
unit rental details: Entire rental unit hosted by Xavien6 guests ·  · 1 bedroom ·  · 2 beds ·  · 1 bath
number of guests: 6 guests · **__** · 1 bedroom · **__** · 2 beds · **__** · 1 bath**__**Joined in June 2016**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap**__**Privacy·**__**·Terms·**__**·Sitemap
more description: You'll be impressed by the high standard of comfort in this cozy suite. Its central location in Houston makes it an excellent choice for a relaxing getaway. We think it's the best place to stay if you want to see and do everything the area has to offer in style and convenience. The time has come for you to be moved to action! You're in close proximity to some amazing places. Finally, a surefire way to unwind and have fun. Throughout the entire day.The spaceWhat is it about this suite that appeals to us so much? It has a straightforward design that allows for a maximum of six occupants. The walk-in closet has two air mattresses available for you to use if you find that you require them.You will immediately feel as comfortable as a cloud thanks to our sofa chair and futon that are designed in a vintage manner. We wanted our guests to feel like they were in a living room with family or friends, so we equipped the living room with standing food trays and a GIANT 55-inch Smart TV. Here, you can watch the latest shows, movies, and news, and you can even go on YouTube to learn new tik toks.We want our guests' most productive days to start with drinks made in our coffee maker or blender. We also keep silverware, pots, pans, plates, mugs, bowls, and cooking tools so that we can make the best home-cooked meals. What's the point of a nice suite if it doesn't have a great kitchen that's fully stocked?We want our guests to be able to get simple items without having to go far, so we decided to invest in a personal washer and dryer and provide expert maintenance support for it. This will ensure that your clothing are always clean and ready to be worn.It is much simpler to maintain the temperature exactly where you want it when you have a heating and cooling system that is centrally located.You can use our Keratin body wash and conditioner at any time of the day to calm and refresh your skin. Our luxury white towels wrap around your body, and our hand-made bathroom rug catches your feet before they hit the cold floor. Our full bathroom is equipped with toilet paper, eco-friendly hand soap, a classic vanity mirror, and a high-pressure shower head that can be removed.After a stressful day at work, you may unwind on our private patio during the day and turn on our highlighted flame light in the evening to transform the space into a more intimate setting that is ideal for romance or unwinding.You can keep your mind and body sharp by going to our gym, which is next to the pool area. Full of cardio and weight-lifting machines, so you can get in a solid exercise without being trapped in traffic or taking too much time away from your schedule. Your body is the most important site of worship?OTHER FEATURES• A separate, private location in your home that is equipped with both a computer and Wi-Fi and serves as a dedicated workspace for when you are working from home.• A high-definition television with a screen measuring 55 inches that comes equipped with Disney+, HBO Max, Amazon Prime Video, Apple TV, Hulu, and Roku so that you can watch all of your favorite shows.• Outdoor dining areaOn-site parking is provided at no cost to guests.• The structure is equipped with surveillance cameras.• Detectors for both smoke and fire; alarms• The washing and dryer are located inside, and they also have a terrace outside where they are located.• Free use of fitness equipment such as treadmills, weights, stationary cycles, and more
